-        final String oldFaviconLink = getFaviconLink();
-        final String newFaviconLink = getReleaseFaviconLink();
-        if (!oldFaviconLink.equalsIgnoreCase(newFaviconLink)) {
-            replacements.put(oldFaviconLink, newFaviconLink);
-            HTMLUtils.updateHTML(directory, replacements);
-        }
-    }
-
-    /**
-     * Replace the basic CSS file in released documentation.
-     *
-     * @param directory Directory enclosing HTML documents with CSS.
-     * @throws IOException Could not replace CSS file with new content.
-     */
-    final void replaceCSS(final String directory) throws IOException {
-        final File newCss = new File(getBuildDirectory().getPath(), getReleaseCssFileName());
-
-        final File dir = new File(directory);
-        final String[] ext = {&quot;css&quot;};
-        final boolean isRecursive = true;
-        for (File oldCss : FileUtils.listFiles(dir, ext, isRecursive)) {
-            if (getPreSiteCssFileName().equals(oldCss.getName())) {
-                FileUtils.copyFile(newCss, oldCss);
-            }
-        }
-    }
-
-    /**
-     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
-     */
-    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
-        /**
-         * Returns element specifying built documents to copy to the release
-         * directory. Currently only HTML and PDF are copied.
-         *
-         * @return Compound element specifying built documents to copy
-         * @throws MojoExecutionException Something went wrong getting document names.
-         */
-        private MojoExecutor.Element getResources() throws MojoExecutionException {
-
-            ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt; r = new ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt;();
-
-            Set&lt;String&gt; docNames = DocUtils.getDocumentNames(
-                    getDocbkxSourceDirectory(), getDocumentSrcName());
-            if (docNames.isEmpty()) {
-                throw new MojoExecutionException(&quot;No document names found.&quot;);
-            }
-
-
-            List&lt;String&gt; formats = getOutputFormats(&quot;html&quot;, &quot;pdf&quot;);
-
-            if (formats.contains(&quot;html&quot;)) {
-                String htmlDir = FilenameUtils
-                        .separatorsToUnix(getDocbkxOutputDirectory().getPath())
-                        + &quot;/html/&quot;;
-                r.add(element(name(&quot;resource&quot;),
-                        element(name(&quot;directory&quot;), htmlDir)));
-            }
-
-            if (formats.contains(&quot;pdf&quot;)) {
-                String pdfDir = FilenameUtils
-                        .separatorsToUnix(getDocbkxOutputDirectory().getPath())
-                        + &quot;/pdf/&quot;;
-                r.add(element(
-                        name(&quot;resource&quot;),
-                        element(name(&quot;directory&quot;), pdfDir),
-                        element(name(&quot;includes&quot;),
-                                element(name(&quot;include&quot;), &quot;**/*.pdf&quot;))));
-            }
-
-            return element(&quot;resources&quot;, r.toArray(new Element[r.size()]));
-        }
-
-        /**
-         * Lay out documentation under the release directory.
-         *
-         * @throws MojoExecutionException Problem during execution.
-         */
-        public void layout() throws MojoExecutionException {
-            if (getReleaseDirectory() == null) {
-                throw new MojoExecutionException(&quot;&lt;releaseDirectory&gt; must be set.&quot;);
-            }
-
-            String releaseDocDirectory = FilenameUtils
-                    .separatorsToUnix(getReleaseDirectory().getPath())
-                    + &quot;/&quot;
-                    + getReleaseVersion();
-            executeMojo(
-                    plugin(groupId(&quot;org.apache.maven.plugins&quot;),
-                            artifactId(&quot;maven-resources-plugin&quot;),
-                            version(getResourcesVersion())),
-                    goal(&quot;copy-resources&quot;),
-                    configuration(
-                            element(name(&quot;encoding&quot;), &quot;UTF-8&quot;),
-                            element(name(&quot;outputDirectory&quot;),
-                                    releaseDocDirectory), getResources()),
-                    executionEnvironment(getProject(), getSession(),
-                            getPluginManager()));
-        }
-
-        /**
-         * Zip release layout content if configured to do so.
-         * &lt;p&gt;
-         * This zips the release layout only on one level,
-         * and does not handle assembly of multiple zips
-         * into a single documentation set .zip.
-         *
-         * @throws MojoExecutionException Problem during execution.
-         */
-        public void zip() throws MojoExecutionException {
-            if (!doBuildReleaseZip()) {
-                return;
-            }
-
-            URL resource = getClass().getResource(&quot;/zip.xml&quot;);
-            File assembly = new File(getBuildDirectory(), &quot;assembly.xml&quot;);
-            try {
-                FileUtils.copyURLToFile(resource, assembly);
-            } catch (IOException e) {
-                throw new MojoExecutionException(&quot;Failed to extract the assembly: &quot;
-                        + e.getMessage());
-            }
-
-
-            final String finalName = getProjectName() + &quot;-&quot; + getReleaseVersion();
-            final String assemblyFile = FilenameUtils.separatorsToUnix(assembly.getPath());
-
-            executeMojo(
-                    plugin(
-                            groupId(&quot;org.apache.maven.plugins&quot;),
-                            artifactId(&quot;maven-assembly-plugin&quot;),
-                            version(&quot;2.4&quot;)),
-                    goal(&quot;single&quot;),
-                    configuration(
-                            element(name(&quot;finalName&quot;), finalName),
-                            element(name(&quot;descriptors&quot;),
-                                    element(name(&quot;descriptor&quot;), assemblyFile))),
-                    executionEnvironment(getProject(), getSession(), getPluginManager()));
-        }
-    }
-}

<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/ReleaseMojo.java (0 => 2242)</h4>

<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/ReleaseMojo.java                                (rev 0)

</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven;
+
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.release.Css;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.release.Favicon;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.release.IndexHtml;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.release.Layout;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.release.PdfNames;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.release.Zip;
+
+/**
+ * Call other classes to prepare release layout documents.
+ *
+ * @Checkstyle:ignoreFor 2
+ * @goal release
+ * @phase site
+ */
+public class ReleaseMojo extends AbstractDocbkxMojo {
+
+    /**
+     * Call other classes to prepare release layout documents.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to prepare docs successfully.
+     */
+    @Override
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        (new Layout(this)).execute();
+        (new IndexHtml(this)).execute();
+        (new PdfNames(this)).execute();
+        (new Favicon(this)).execute();
+        (new Css(this)).execute();
+        (new Zip(this)).execute();
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenSiteBuildMojojava"></a>

-/**

- * {@code ${project.build.directory}/site/doc}.

- * @Checkstyle:ignoreFor 2
- * @goal layout
- * @phase site
- */
-public class SiteBuildMojo extends AbstractBuildMojo {
-    /**
-     * File system directory for site content, relative to the build directory.
-     *
-     * @parameter default-value=&quot;site&quot; property=&quot;siteDirectory&quot;
-     * @required
-     */
-    private String siteDirectory;
-
-    /**
-     * File system directory for site content, relative to the build directory.
-     *
-     * @return {@link #siteDirectory}
-     */
-    public final File getSiteDirectory() {
-        return new File(getBuildDirectory(), siteDirectory);
-    }
-
-    /**
-     * {@inheritDoc}
-     */
-    @Override
-    public final void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
-        Executor exec = new Executor();
-        getLog().info(&quot;Laying out site...&quot;);
-        exec.layout();
-
-        getLog().info(&quot;Adding .htaccess file...&quot;);
-        String layoutDir = getSiteDirectory().getPath() + File.separator
-                + &quot;doc&quot;;
-        File htaccess = new File(getBuildDirectory().getPath() + File.separator
-                + &quot;.htaccess&quot;);
-        FileUtils.deleteQuietly(htaccess);
-        try {
-            FileUtils.copyURLToFile(getClass().getResource(&quot;/.htaccess&quot;),
-                    htaccess);
-            HTMLUtils.addHtaccess(layoutDir, htaccess);
-        } catch (IOException e) {
-            throw new MojoExecutionException(&quot;Failed to copy .htaccess: &quot;
-                    + e.getMessage());
-        }
-
-        getLog().info(&quot;Add redirect to docs.html under layout directory...&quot;);
-        try {
-            File file = new File(getSiteDirectory().getPath() + File.separator
-                    + &quot;doc&quot; + File.separator + &quot;index.html&quot;);
-            if (!file.exists()) {
-                String redirect = IOUtils.toString(
-                        getClass().getResourceAsStream(&quot;/index.html&quot;), &quot;UTF-8&quot;);
-                redirect = redirect.replaceAll(&quot;PROJECT&quot;, getProjectName())
-                        .replaceAll(&quot;LOWERCASE&quot;, getProjectName().toLowerCase());
-                FileUtils.write(file, redirect, &quot;UTF-8&quot;);
-            }
-        } catch (IOException e) {
-            throw new MojoExecutionException(&quot;Failed to copy redirect file: &quot;
-                    + e.getMessage());
-        }
-
-        // Test links in document source, and generate a report.
-        if (!runLinkTester().equalsIgnoreCase(&quot;false&quot;)) {
-            getLog().info(&quot;Running linktester...&quot;);
-            exec.testLinks();
-        }
-    }
-
-    /**
-     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
-     */
-    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
-        /**
-         * Returns element specifying built documents to copy to the site
-         * directory. Man pages are not currently copied anywhere.
-         *
-         * @return Compound element specifying built documents to copy
-         * @throws MojoExecutionException Something went wrong getting document names.
-         */
-        private MojoExecutor.Element getResources() throws MojoExecutionException {
-
-            ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt; r = new ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt;();
-
-            Set&lt;String&gt; docNames = DocUtils.getDocumentNames(
-                    getDocbkxSourceDirectory(), getDocumentSrcName());
-            if (docNames.isEmpty()) {
-                throw new MojoExecutionException(&quot;No document names found.&quot;);
-            }
-
-            List&lt;String&gt; formats = getOutputFormats();
-
-            if (formats.contains(&quot;epub&quot;)) {
-                String epubDir = FilenameUtils
-                        .separatorsToUnix(getDocbkxOutputDirectory()
-                                .getPath())
-                        + &quot;/epub/&quot;;
-                r.add(element(
-                        name(&quot;resource&quot;),
-                        element(name(&quot;directory&quot;), epubDir),
-                        element(name(&quot;includes&quot;),
-                                element(name(&quot;include&quot;), &quot;**/*.epub&quot;))));
-            }
-
-            if (formats.contains(&quot;html&quot;)) {
-                String htmlDir = FilenameUtils
-                        .separatorsToUnix(getDocbkxOutputDirectory().getPath())
-                        + &quot;/html/&quot;;
-                r.add(element(name(&quot;resource&quot;),
-                        element(name(&quot;directory&quot;), htmlDir)));
-            }
-
-            if (formats.contains(&quot;pdf&quot;)) {
-                String pdfDir = FilenameUtils
-                        .separatorsToUnix(getDocbkxOutputDirectory().getPath())
-                        + &quot;/pdf/&quot;;
-                r.add(element(
-                        name(&quot;resource&quot;),
-                        element(name(&quot;directory&quot;), pdfDir),
-                        element(name(&quot;includes&quot;),
-                                element(name(&quot;include&quot;), &quot;**/*.pdf&quot;))));
-            }
-
-            if (formats.contains(&quot;rtf&quot;)) {
-                String rtfDir = FilenameUtils
-                        .separatorsToUnix(getDocbkxOutputDirectory().getPath())
-                        + &quot;/rtf/&quot;;
-                r.add(element(
-                        name(&quot;resource&quot;),
-                        element(name(&quot;directory&quot;), rtfDir),
-                        element(name(&quot;includes&quot;),
-                                element(name(&quot;include&quot;), &quot;**/*.rtf&quot;))));
-            }
-
-            // The webhelp is handled separately.
-
-            return element(&quot;resources&quot;, r.toArray(new Element[r.size()]));
-        }
-
-        /**
-         * Lay out docs in site directory under &lt;code&gt;target/site/doc&lt;/code&gt;.
-         *
-         * @throws MojoExecutionException Problem during execution.
-         */
-        public void layout() throws MojoExecutionException {
-            if (getSiteDirectory() == null) {
-                throw new MojoExecutionException(&quot;&lt;siteDirectory&gt; must be set.&quot;);
-            }
-
-            String siteDocDirectory = FilenameUtils
-                    .separatorsToUnix(getSiteDirectory().getPath()) + &quot;/doc&quot;;
-            executeMojo(
-                    plugin(groupId(&quot;org.apache.maven.plugins&quot;),
-                            artifactId(&quot;maven-resources-plugin&quot;),
-                            version(getResourcesVersion())),
-                    goal(&quot;copy-resources&quot;),
-                    configuration(element(name(&quot;encoding&quot;), &quot;UTF-8&quot;),
-                            element(name(&quot;outputDirectory&quot;), siteDocDirectory),
-                            getResources()),
-                    executionEnvironment(getProject(), getSession(),
-                            getPluginManager()));
-
-            // The webhelp directory needs to be copied in its entirety
-            // to avoid overwriting other HTML.
-            if (getOutputFormats().contains(&quot;webhelp&quot;)) {
-
-                // 2.0.15 does not allow &lt;webhelpBaseDir&gt; to be set,
-                // so the output location is hard-coded for now.
-                String webHelpDir =
-                        FilenameUtils.separatorsToUnix(
-                                getDocbkxOutputDirectory().getPath() + &quot;/webhelp&quot;);
-                executeMojo(
-                        plugin(groupId(&quot;org.apache.maven.plugins&quot;),
-                                artifactId(&quot;maven-resources-plugin&quot;),
-                                version(getResourcesVersion())),
-                        goal(&quot;copy-resources&quot;),
-                        configuration(element(name(&quot;encoding&quot;), &quot;UTF-8&quot;),
-                                element(name(&quot;outputDirectory&quot;), siteDocDirectory + &quot;/webhelp&quot;),
-                                element(name(&quot;resources&quot;),
-                                        element(name(&quot;resource&quot;),
-                                                element(name(&quot;directory&quot;), webHelpDir),
-                                                element(name(&quot;excludes&quot;),
-                                                        element(name(&quot;exclude&quot;), &quot;**/*.target.db&quot;))))),
-                        executionEnvironment(getProject(), getSession(),
-                                getPluginManager()));
-            }
-        }
-
-        /**
-         * Test links in source documentation.
-         *
-         * @throws MojoExecutionException Problem during execution.
-         */
-        void testLinks() throws MojoExecutionException {
-            String include = &quot;**/&quot; + getDocumentSrcName();
-
-            if (getJCiteOutputDirectory().exists()) {
-                include = getJCiteOutputDirectory().getPath() + &quot;/&quot; + include;
-            } else if (doUseFilteredSources()) {
-                include = getFilteredDocbkxSourceDirectory().getPath() + &quot;/&quot; + include;
-            }
-
-            final String log = getDocbkxOutputDirectory().getPath() + File.separator
-                    + &quot;linktester.err&quot;;
-
-            final String jiraUrlPattern =
-                    &quot;^https://bugster.forgerock.org/jira/browse/OPEN(AM|ICF|IDM|IG|DJ)-[0-9]{1,4}$&quot;;
-            final String rfcUrlPattern = &quot;^http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc[0-9]+$&quot;;
-
-            executeMojo(
-                    plugin(groupId(&quot;org.forgerock.maven.plugins&quot;),
-                            artifactId(&quot;linktester-maven-plugin&quot;),
-                            version(getLinkTesterVersion())),
-                    goal(&quot;check&quot;),
-                    configuration(
-                            element(name(&quot;includes&quot;),
-                                    element(name(&quot;include&quot;), include)),
-                            element(name(&quot;validating&quot;), &quot;true&quot;),
-                            element(name(&quot;skipUrls&quot;), skipLinkCheck()),
-                            element(name(&quot;xIncludeAware&quot;), &quot;true&quot;),
-                            element(name(&quot;failOnError&quot;), &quot;false&quot;),
-                            element(name(&quot;outputFile&quot;), log),
-                            element(name(&quot;skipUrlPatterns&quot;),
-                                    element(name(&quot;skipUrlPattern&quot;), jiraUrlPattern),
-                                    element(name(&quot;skipUrlPattern&quot;), rfcUrlPattern))),
-                    executionEnvironment(getProject(), getSession(),
-                            getPluginManager()));
-        }
-    }
-}
</del></span></pre></div>

<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/SiteMojo.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/SiteMojo.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/SiteMojo.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)

</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven;
+
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.site.Htaccess;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.site.Layout;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.site.LinkTest;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.site.Redirect;
+
+/**
+ * Call other classes to copy docs to site build directory.
+ *
+ * @Checkstyle:ignoreFor 2
+ * @goal site
+ * @phase site
+ */
+public class SiteMojo extends AbstractDocbkxMojo {
+
+    /**
+     * Call other classes to copy docs to site build directory.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to copy docs successfully.
+     */
+    @Override
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        (new Layout(this)).execute();
+        (new Htaccess(this)).execute();
+        (new Redirect(this)).execute();
+        (new LinkTest(this)).execute();
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenbuildChunkedHtmljava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/ChunkedHtml.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/ChunkedHtml.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/ChunkedHtml.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,217 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.build;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
+import org.apache.commons.io.FilenameUtils;
+import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.utils.ImageCopier;
+import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
+
+import java.io.File;
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.util.ArrayList;
+import java.util.Set;
+
+/**
+ * Build chunked HTML output.
+ */
+public class ChunkedHtml {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public ChunkedHtml(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Build documents from DocBook XML sources.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build output.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        Executor executor = new Executor();
+        executor.prepareOlinkDB();
+        executor.build();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Get absolute path to a temporary Olink target database XML document
+     * that points to the individual generated Olink DB files,
+     * for chunked HTML.
+     *
+     * @return Absolute path to the temporary file
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Could not write target DB file.
+     */
+    final String getTargetDB() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        File targetDB = new File(m.getBuildDirectory() + File.separator  + &quot;olinkdb-chunked-html.xml&quot;);
+
+        try {
+            StringBuilder content = new StringBuilder();
+            content.append(&quot;&lt;?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot;&lt;!DOCTYPE targetset [\n&quot;);
+
+            String targetDbDtd = IOUtils.toString(getClass()
+                    .getResourceAsStream(&quot;/targetdatabase.dtd&quot;));
+            content.append(targetDbDtd).append(&quot;\n&quot;);
+
+            final Set&lt;String&gt; docNames = m.getDocNames();
+
+            for (String docName : docNames) {
+/*  &lt;targetsFilename&gt; is ignored with docbkx-tools 2.0.15.
+                String sysId = getBuildDirectory().getAbsolutePath()
+                        + File.separator + docName + &quot;-chunked.target.db&quot;;
+*/
+                String sysId = m.getBaseDir().getAbsolutePath() + &quot;/target/docbkx/html/&quot;
+                        + docName + &quot;/index.html.target.db&quot;;
+
+                content.append(&quot;&lt;!ENTITY &quot;).append(docName)
+                        .append(&quot; SYSTEM '&quot;).append(sysId).append(&quot;'&gt;\n&quot;);
+            }
+
+            content.append(&quot;]&gt;\n&quot;)
+
+                    .append(&quot;&lt;targetset&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot; &lt;targetsetinfo&gt;Target DB for DocBook content,\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot; for use with chunked HTML only.&lt;/targetsetinfo&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot; &lt;sitemap&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot;  &lt;dir name='doc'&gt;\n&quot;);
+
+            String baseName = FilenameUtils.getBaseName(m.getDocumentSrcName());
+            for (String docName : docNames) {
+                content.append(&quot;   &lt;dir name='&quot;).append(docName).append(&quot;'&gt;\n&quot;)
+                        .append(&quot;    &lt;dir name='&quot;).append(baseName).append(&quot;'&gt;\n&quot;)
+                        .append(&quot;     &lt;document targetdoc='&quot;).append(docName).append(&quot;'\n&quot;)
+                        .append(&quot;               baseuri='../../&quot;)
+                        .append(docName).append(&quot;/&quot;).append(baseName).append(&quot;/'&gt;\n&quot;)
+                        .append(&quot;      &amp;&quot;).append(docName).append(&quot;;\n&quot;)
+                        .append(&quot;     &lt;/document&gt;\n&quot;)
+                        .append(&quot;    &lt;/dir&gt;\n&quot;)
+                        .append(&quot;   &lt;/dir&gt;\n&quot;);
+            }
+
+            content.append(&quot;  &lt;/dir&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot; &lt;/sitemap&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot;&lt;/targetset&gt;\n&quot;);
+
+            FileUtils.writeStringToFile(targetDB, content.toString());
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            throw new MojoExecutionException(
+                    &quot;Failed to write link target database: &quot; + e.getMessage());
+        }
+        return targetDB.getPath();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
+     */
+    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
+
+        /**
+         * Prepare olink target database from DocBook XML sources.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build target database.
+         */
+        void prepareOlinkDB() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+            for (String docName : m.getDocNames()) {
+                ArrayList&lt;Element&gt; cfg = new ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt;();
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;xincludeSupported&quot;), m.isXincludeSupported()));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;sourceDirectory&quot;),
+                        m.path(m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory())));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;chunkedOutput&quot;), &quot;true&quot;));
+
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;htmlCustomization&quot;),
+                        m.path(m.getChunkedHTMLCustomization())));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;collectXrefTargets&quot;), &quot;only&quot;));
+
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;currentDocid&quot;), docName));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;includes&quot;), docName + &quot;/&quot; + m.getDocumentSrcName()));
+
+/*  &lt;targetsFilename&gt; is ignored with docbkx-tools 2.0.15.
+                cfg.add(element(
+                        name(&quot;targetsFilename&quot;),
+                        FilenameUtils.separatorsToUnix(getBuildDirectory()
+                                .getPath())
+                                + &quot;/&quot;
+                                + docName
+                                + &quot;-chunked.target.db&quot;));
+*/
+
+                final String base = FilenameUtils.getBaseName(m.getDocumentSrcName());
+                final String chunkBaseDir = m.path(m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory())
+                        + &quot;/html/&quot; + docName + &quot;/&quot; + base + &quot;/&quot;;
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;chunkBaseDir&quot;), chunkBaseDir));
+
+                executeMojo(
+                        plugin(groupId(&quot;com.agilejava.docbkx&quot;),
+                                artifactId(&quot;docbkx-maven-plugin&quot;),
+                                version(m.getDocbkxVersion())),
+                        goal(&quot;generate-html&quot;),
+                        configuration(cfg.toArray(new Element[cfg.size()])),
+                        executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+            }
+        }
+
+        /**
+         * Build documents from DocBook XML sources.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build the output.
+         */
+        void build() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+            ImageCopier.copyImages(&quot;html&quot;, FilenameUtils.getBaseName(m.getDocumentSrcName()),
+                    m.getDocumentSrcName(), m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory(), m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory());
+
+            for (String docName : m.getDocNames()) {
+                ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt; cfg = new ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt;();
+                cfg.addAll(m.getBaseConfiguration());
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;chunkedOutput&quot;), &quot;true&quot;));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;htmlCustomization&quot;), m.path(m.getChunkedHTMLCustomization())));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;targetDatabaseDocument&quot;), getTargetDB()));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;generateManifest&quot;), &quot;1&quot;));
+
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;includes&quot;), docName + &quot;/&quot; + m.getDocumentSrcName()));
+
+                final String base = FilenameUtils.getBaseName(m.getDocumentSrcName());
+                final String chunkBaseDir = m.path(m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory())
+                        + &quot;/html/&quot; + docName + &quot;/&quot; + base + &quot;/&quot;;
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;chunkBaseDir&quot;), chunkBaseDir));
+
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;manifest&quot;),
+                        m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory().getPath()
+                                + &quot;/&quot; + docName + &quot;.manifest&quot;));
+
+                executeMojo(
+                        plugin(groupId(&quot;com.agilejava.docbkx&quot;),
+                                artifactId(&quot;docbkx-maven-plugin&quot;),
+                                version(m.getDocbkxVersion())),
+                        goal(&quot;generate-html&quot;),
+                        configuration(cfg.toArray(new Element[cfg.size()])),
+                        executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+            }
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenbuildEpubjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/Epub.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/Epub.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/Epub.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,105 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.build;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.FilenameUtils;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.utils.ImageCopier;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.utils.NameUtils;
+import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
+
+import java.io.File;
+import java.util.ArrayList;
+
+/**
+ * Build EPUB output format.
+ */
+public class Epub {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public Epub(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Build documents from DocBook XML sources.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build output.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        Executor executor = new Executor();
+        executor.prepareOlinkDB();
+        executor.build();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
+     */
+    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
+
+        /**
+         * Prepare olink target database from DocBook XML sources.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build target database.
+         */
+        void prepareOlinkDB() throws MojoExecutionException {
+            // Not implemented yet.
+        }
+
+        /**
+         * Build documents from DocBook XML sources.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build the output.
+         */
+        void build() throws MojoExecutionException {
+            ImageCopier.copyImages(&quot;epub&quot;, &quot;&quot;, m.getDocumentSrcName(),
+                    m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory(), m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory());
+
+            for (String docName : m.getDocNames()) {
+                ArrayList&lt;Element&gt; cfg = new ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt;();
+                cfg.addAll(m.getBaseConfiguration());
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;epubCustomization&quot;), m.path(m.getEpubCustomization())));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;targetDirectory&quot;),
+                        m.path(m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory()) + &quot;/epub&quot;));
+
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;includes&quot;), docName + &quot;/&quot;
+                        + m.getDocumentSrcName()));
+
+                executeMojo(
+                        plugin(groupId(&quot;com.agilejava.docbkx&quot;),
+                                artifactId(&quot;docbkx-maven-plugin&quot;),
+                                version(m.getDocbkxVersion())),
+                        goal(&quot;generate-epub&quot;),
+                        configuration(cfg.toArray(new Element[cfg.size()])),
+                        executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+
+                File outputEpub = new File(
+                        new File(m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory(), &quot;epub&quot;),
+                        FilenameUtils.getBaseName(m.getDocumentSrcName()) + &quot;.epub&quot;);
+                NameUtils.renameDocument(outputEpub, docName, m.getProjectName());
+            }
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenbuildFojava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/Fo.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/Fo.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/Fo.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,294 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.build;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
+import org.apache.commons.io.FilenameUtils;
+import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.pre.Fop;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.utils.NameUtils;
+import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
+
+import java.io.File;
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.util.ArrayList;
+import java.util.Iterator;
+import java.util.Set;
+
+/**
+ * Build FO output formats.
+ */
+public class Fo {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public Fo(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Supported FO formats include &quot;pdf&quot; and &quot;rtf&quot;.
+     */
+    private String format = &quot;pdf&quot;;
+
+    /**
+     * Get the format.
+     * Defaults to PDF unless the format has been set to RTF.
+     *
+     * @return The format, either &quot;pdf&quot; or &quot;rtf&quot;.
+     */
+    public String getFormat() {
+        return format;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Set the format to PDF or RTF.
+     * Defaults to PDF unless RTF is specified (case does not matter).
+     *
+     * @param format Either {@code pdf} or {@code rtf}.
+     */
+    public void setFormat(final String format) {
+        if (format.equalsIgnoreCase(&quot;rtf&quot;)) {
+            this.format = &quot;rtf&quot;;
+        } else {
+            this.format = &quot;pdf&quot;;
+        }
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Build documents from DocBook XML sources.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build output.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        Executor executor = new Executor();
+        executor.prepareOlinkDB();
+        executor.build();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Get absolute path to a temporary Olink target database XML document
+     * that points to the individual generated Olink DB files, for FO (PDF, RTF).
+     *
+     * @return Absolute path to the temporary file
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Could not write target DB file.
+     */
+    final String getTargetDB() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        File targetDB = new File(m.getBuildDirectory(), &quot;olinkdb-&quot; + getFormat() + &quot;.xml&quot;);
+
+        try {
+            StringBuilder content = new StringBuilder();
+            content.append(&quot;&lt;?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot;&lt;!DOCTYPE targetset[\n&quot;);
+
+            String targetDbDtd = IOUtils.toString(getClass()
+                    .getResourceAsStream(&quot;/targetdatabase.dtd&quot;));
+            content.append(targetDbDtd).append(&quot;\n&quot;);
+
+            final Set&lt;String&gt; docNames = m.getDocNames();
+
+            for (String docName : m.getDocNames()) {
+/*  &lt;targetsFilename&gt; is ignored with docbkx-tools 2.0.15.
+                String sysId = getBuildDirectory().getAbsolutePath()
+                        + File.separator + docName + &quot;-&quot; + extension + &quot;.target.db&quot;;
+*/
+                String sysId = m.getBaseDir().getAbsolutePath()
+                        + &quot;/target/docbkx/&quot; + getFormat() + &quot;/&quot; + docName
+                        + &quot;/index.fo.target.db&quot;;
+
+                content.append(&quot;&lt;!ENTITY &quot;).append(docName)
+                        .append(&quot; SYSTEM '&quot;).append(sysId).append(&quot;'&gt;\n&quot;);
+            }
+
+            content.append(&quot;]&gt;\n&quot;)
+
+                    .append(&quot;&lt;targetset&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot; &lt;targetsetinfo&gt;Target DB for DocBook content,\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot; for use with &quot;)
+                    .append(getFormat().toUpperCase())
+                    .append(&quot; only.&lt;/targetsetinfo&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot; &lt;sitemap&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot;  &lt;dir name='doc'&gt;\n&quot;);
+
+            final String version = m.getReleaseVersion();
+            for (String docName : docNames) {
+                String fileName = NameUtils.renameDoc(
+                        m.getProjectName(), docName, version, getFormat());
+
+                content.append(&quot;   &lt;document targetdoc='&quot;).append(docName).append(&quot;'&quot;)
+                        .append(&quot;             baseuri='&quot;).append(fileName).append(&quot;'&gt;&quot;)
+                        .append(&quot;    &amp;&quot;).append(docName).append(&quot;;&quot;)
+                        .append(&quot;   &lt;/document&gt;\n&quot;);
+            }
+            content.append(&quot;  &lt;/dir&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot; &lt;/sitemap&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot;&lt;/targetset&gt;\n&quot;);
+
+            FileUtils.writeStringToFile(targetDB, content.toString());
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            throw new MojoExecutionException(
+                    &quot;Failed to write link target database: &quot; + e.getMessage());
+        }
+        return targetDB.getPath();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
+     */
+    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
+
+        /**
+         * Prepare olink target database from DocBook XML sources.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build target database.
+         */
+        void prepareOlinkDB() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+            for (String docName : m.getDocNames()) {
+                ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt; cfg = new ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt;();
+                cfg.addAll(m.getBaseConfiguration());
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;xincludeSupported&quot;), m.isXincludeSupported()));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;sourceDirectory&quot;),
+                        m.path(m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory())));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;fop1Extensions&quot;), &quot;1&quot;));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;collectXrefTargets&quot;), &quot;yes&quot;));
+                if (getFormat().equalsIgnoreCase(&quot;pdf&quot;)) {
+                    cfg.add(element(name(&quot;insertOlinkPdfFrag&quot;), &quot;1&quot;));
+                }
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;includes&quot;), docName + &quot;/&quot; + m.getDocumentSrcName()));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;currentDocid&quot;), docName));
+
+                // &lt;targetsFilename&gt; is ignored with docbkx-tools 2.0.15,
+                // but not with 2.0.14.
+
+                // The following configuration should be kept
+                // for versions of docbkx-tools that honor &lt;targetsFilename&gt;.
+                cfg.add(element(
+                        name(&quot;targetsFilename&quot;),
+                        m.path(m.getBuildDirectory()) + &quot;/&quot; + docName + &quot;-&quot; + getFormat() + &quot;.target.db&quot;));
+
+                // Due to https://code.google.com/p/docbkx-tools/issues/detail?id=112
+                // RTF generation does not work with docbkx-tools 2.0.15.
+                // If the format is RTF, stick with 2.0.14 for now.
+                // TODO: Remove this sick hack when docbkx-tools #112 is fixed.
+                String docbkxVersion = m.getDocbkxVersion();
+                if (getFormat().equalsIgnoreCase(&quot;rtf&quot;)) {
+                    docbkxVersion = &quot;2.0.14&quot;;
+                }
+
+                executeMojo(
+                        plugin(groupId(&quot;com.agilejava.docbkx&quot;),
+                                artifactId(&quot;docbkx-maven-plugin&quot;),
+                                version(docbkxVersion)),
+                        goal(&quot;generate-&quot; + getFormat()),
+                        configuration(cfg.toArray(new Element[cfg.size()])),
+                        executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager())
+                );
+
+                File outputDir = new File(m.getBaseDir(),
+                        &quot;target&quot; + File.separator + &quot;docbkx&quot; + File.separator
+                                + getFormat() + File.separator + docName);
+
+                // &lt;targetsFilename&gt; is ignored with docbkx-tools 2.0.15,
+                // but not with 2.0.14.
+                // The following output directory should be where the files are
+                // for versions of docbkx-tools that honor &lt;targetsFilename&gt;.
+                if (!outputDir.exists()) {
+                    outputDir = new File(m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory(),
+                            getFormat() + File.separator + docName);
+                }
+
+                try {
+                    String[] extensions = {&quot;fo&quot;, getFormat()};
+                    Iterator&lt;File&gt; files =
+                            FileUtils.iterateFiles(outputDir, extensions, true);
+                    while (files.hasNext()) {
+                        FileUtils.forceDelete(files.next());
+                    }
+                } catch (IOException e) {
+                    throw new MojoExecutionException(
+                            &quot;Cannot delete a file: &quot; + e.getMessage());
+                }
+            }
+        }
+
+        /**
+         * Build documents from DocBook XML sources.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build the output.
+         */
+        void build() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+            for (String docName : m.getDocNames()) {
+                ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt; cfg = new ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt;();
+                cfg.addAll(m.getBaseConfiguration());
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;foCustomization&quot;), m.path(m.getFoCustomization())));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;fop1Extensions&quot;), &quot;1&quot;));
+                if (getFormat().equalsIgnoreCase(&quot;pdf&quot;)) {
+                    cfg.add(element(name(&quot;insertOlinkPdfFrag&quot;), &quot;1&quot;));
+                }
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;targetDatabaseDocument&quot;), getTargetDB()));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;targetDirectory&quot;),
+                        m.path(m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory()) + &quot;/&quot; + getFormat()));
+
+                final String fontDir = m.path(m.getFontsDirectory());
+                cfg.add(Fop.getFontsElement(fontDir));
+
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;includes&quot;), docName + &quot;/&quot; + m.getDocumentSrcName()));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;currentDocid&quot;), docName));
+
+                // Due to https://code.google.com/p/docbkx-tools/issues/detail?id=112
+                // RTF generation does not work with docbkx-tools 2.0.15.
+                // If the format is RTF, stick with 2.0.14 for now.
+                // TODO: Remove this sick hack when docbkx-tools #112 is fixed.
+                String docbkxVersion = m.getDocbkxVersion();
+                if (format.equalsIgnoreCase(&quot;rtf&quot;)) {
+                    docbkxVersion = &quot;2.0.14&quot;;
+                }
+
+                executeMojo(
+                        plugin(
+                                groupId(&quot;com.agilejava.docbkx&quot;),
+                                artifactId(&quot;docbkx-maven-plugin&quot;),
+                                version(docbkxVersion),
+                                dependencies(
+                                        dependency(
+                                                groupId(&quot;net.sf.offo&quot;),
+                                                artifactId(&quot;fop-hyph&quot;),
+                                                version(&quot;1.2&quot;)))),
+                        goal(&quot;generate-&quot; + getFormat()),
+                        configuration(cfg.toArray(new Element[cfg.size()])),
+                        executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+
+                // Avoid each new document overwriting the last.
+                File file = new File(m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory(), getFormat()
+                        + File.separator
+                        + FilenameUtils.getBaseName(m.getDocumentSrcName()) + &quot;.&quot;
+                        + getFormat());
+                NameUtils.renameDocument(file, docName, m.getProjectName());
+            }
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenbuildManpagejava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/Manpage.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/Manpage.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/Manpage.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,90 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.build;
+
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
+
+import java.util.ArrayList;
+
+/**
+ * Build man page output.
+ */
+public class Manpage {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public Manpage(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Build documents from DocBook XML sources.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build output.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        Executor executor = new Executor();
+        executor.prepareOlinkDB();
+        executor.build();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
+     */
+    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
+
+        /**
+         * Prepare olink target database from DocBook XML sources.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build target database.
+         */
+        void prepareOlinkDB() throws MojoExecutionException {
+            // Not implemented yet.
+        }
+
+        /**
+         * Build documents from DocBook XML sources.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build the output.
+         */
+        void build() throws MojoExecutionException {
+            ArrayList&lt;Element&gt; cfg = new ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt;();
+            cfg.addAll(m.getBaseConfiguration());
+            cfg.add(element(name(&quot;includes&quot;), &quot;*/&quot; + m.getDocumentSrcName()));
+            cfg.add(element(name(&quot;manpagesCustomization&quot;),
+                    m.path(m.getManpagesCustomization())));
+            cfg.add(element(name(&quot;targetDirectory&quot;),
+                    m.path(m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory()) + &quot;/manpages&quot;));
+
+            executeMojo(
+                    plugin(groupId(&quot;com.agilejava.docbkx&quot;),
+                            artifactId(&quot;docbkx-maven-plugin&quot;),
+                            version(m.getDocbkxVersion())),
+                    goal(&quot;generate-manpages&quot;),
+                    configuration(cfg.toArray(new Element[cfg.size()])),
+                    executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenbuildPdfjava"></a>

+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/Pdf.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,34 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.build;
+
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+
+/**
+ * Build PDF output.
+ */
+public final class Pdf extends Fo {
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration,
+     * and setting the format to &quot;pdf&quot;.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */

+        super(mojo);
+        super.setFormat(&quot;pdf&quot;);
+    }
+}
