<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/Rtf.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/Rtf.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/Rtf.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,34 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.build;
+
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+
+/**
+ * Build RTF output.
+ */
+public final class Rtf extends Fo {
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration,
+     * and setting the format to &quot;rtf&quot;.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public Rtf(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        super(mojo);
+        super.setFormat(&quot;rtf&quot;);
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenbuildSingleHtmljava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/SingleHtml.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/SingleHtml.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/SingleHtml.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,197 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.build;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
+import org.apache.commons.io.FilenameUtils;
+import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.utils.ImageCopier;
+import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
+
+import java.io.File;
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.util.ArrayList;
+import java.util.Set;
+
+/**
+ * Build single-page HTML output.
+ */
+public class SingleHtml {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public SingleHtml(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Build documents from DocBook XML sources.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build output.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        Executor executor = new Executor();
+        executor.prepareOlinkDB();
+        executor.build();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Get absolute path to a temporary Olink target database XML document
+     * that points to the individual generated Olink DB files,
+     * for single-page HTML.
+     *
+     * @return Absolute path to the temporary file
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Could not write target DB file.
+     */
+    final String getTargetDB() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        File targetDB = new File(
+                m.getBuildDirectory() + File.separator + &quot;olinkdb-single-page-html.xml&quot;);
+
+        try {
+            StringBuilder content = new StringBuilder();
+            content.append(&quot;&lt;?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot;&lt;!DOCTYPE targetset [\n&quot;);
+
+            String targetDbDtd = IOUtils.toString(getClass()
+                    .getResourceAsStream(&quot;/targetdatabase.dtd&quot;));
+            content.append(targetDbDtd).append(&quot;\n&quot;);
+
+            final Set&lt;String&gt; docNames = m.getDocNames();
+
+            for (String docName : docNames) {
+
+/*  &lt;targetsFilename&gt; is ignored with docbkx-tools 2.0.15.
+                String sysId = getBuildDirectory().getAbsolutePath()
+                        + File.separator + docName + &quot;-single.target.db&quot;;
+*/
+                String sysId = m.getBaseDir().getAbsolutePath()
+                        + &quot;/target/docbkx/html/&quot; + docName + &quot;/index.html.target.db&quot;;
+
+                content.append(&quot;&lt;!ENTITY &quot;).append(docName)
+                        .append(&quot; SYSTEM '&quot;).append(sysId).append(&quot;'&gt;\n&quot;);
+            }
+
+            content.append(&quot;]&gt;\n&quot;)
+
+                    .append(&quot;&lt;targetset&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot; &lt;targetsetinfo&gt;Target DB for DocBook content,\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot; for use with single page HTML only.&lt;/targetsetinfo&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot; &lt;sitemap&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot;  &lt;dir name='doc'&gt;\n&quot;);
+
+            for (String docName : docNames) {
+                content.append(&quot;   &lt;document targetdoc='&quot;).append(docName).append(&quot;'\n&quot;)
+                        .append(&quot;             baseuri='../&quot;).append(docName)
+                        .append(&quot;/&quot;).append(FilenameUtils.getBaseName(m.getDocumentSrcName()))
+                        .append(&quot;.html'&gt;\n&quot;)
+                        .append(&quot;    &amp;&quot;).append(docName).append(&quot;;\n&quot;)
+                        .append(&quot;   &lt;/document&gt;\n&quot;);
+            }
+            content.append(&quot;  &lt;/dir&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot; &lt;/sitemap&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot;&lt;/targetset&gt;\n&quot;);
+
+            FileUtils.writeStringToFile(targetDB, content.toString());
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            throw new MojoExecutionException(
+                    &quot;Failed to write link target database: &quot; + e.getMessage());
+        }
+
+        return targetDB.getPath();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
+     */
+    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
+
+        /**
+         * Prepare olink target database from DocBook XML sources.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build target database.
+         */
+        void prepareOlinkDB() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+            for (String docName : m.getDocNames()) {
+                ArrayList&lt;Element&gt; cfg = new ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt;();
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;xincludeSupported&quot;), m.isXincludeSupported()));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;sourceDirectory&quot;),
+                        m.path(m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory())));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;chunkedOutput&quot;), &quot;false&quot;));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;htmlCustomization&quot;),
+                        m.path(m.getSingleHTMLCustomization())));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;collectXrefTargets&quot;), &quot;only&quot;));
+
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;includes&quot;), docName + &quot;/&quot; + m.getDocumentSrcName()));
+
+/*  &lt;targetsFilename&gt; is ignored with docbkx-tools 2.0.15.
+                cfg.add(element(
+                        name(&quot;targetsFilename&quot;),
+                        FilenameUtils.separatorsToUnix(getBuildDirectory()
+                                .getPath())
+                                + &quot;/&quot;
+                                + docName
+                                + &quot;-single.target.db&quot;));
+*/
+
+                executeMojo(
+                        plugin(groupId(&quot;com.agilejava.docbkx&quot;),
+                                artifactId(&quot;docbkx-maven-plugin&quot;),
+                                version(m.getDocbkxVersion())),
+                        goal(&quot;generate-html&quot;),
+                        configuration(cfg.toArray(new Element[cfg.size()])),
+                        executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+            }
+        }
+
+        /**
+         * Build documents from DocBook XML sources.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build the output.
+         */
+        void build() throws MojoExecutionException {
+            ImageCopier.copyImages(&quot;html&quot;, &quot;&quot;, m.getDocumentSrcName(),
+                    m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory(), m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory());
+
+            ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt; cfg = new ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt;();
+            cfg.addAll(m.getBaseConfiguration());
+            cfg.add(element(name(&quot;includes&quot;), &quot;*/&quot; + m.getDocumentSrcName()));
+            cfg.add(element(name(&quot;chunkedOutput&quot;), &quot;false&quot;));
+            cfg.add(element(name(&quot;htmlCustomization&quot;),
+                    m.path(m.getSingleHTMLCustomization())));
+            cfg.add(element(name(&quot;targetDatabaseDocument&quot;), getTargetDB()));
+            cfg.add(element(name(&quot;targetDirectory&quot;),
+                    m.path(m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory()) + &quot;/html&quot;));
+
+            executeMojo(
+                    plugin(groupId(&quot;com.agilejava.docbkx&quot;),
+                            artifactId(&quot;docbkx-maven-plugin&quot;),
+                            version(m.getDocbkxVersion())),
+                    goal(&quot;generate-html&quot;),
+                    configuration(cfg.toArray(new Element[cfg.size()])),
+                    executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenbuildWebhelpjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/Webhelp.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/Webhelp.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/Webhelp.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,215 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.build;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
+import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.utils.ImageCopier;
+import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
+
+import java.io.File;
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.util.ArrayList;
+import java.util.Set;
+
+/**
+ * Build webhelp output.
+ */
+public class Webhelp {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public Webhelp(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Build documents from DocBook XML sources.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build output.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        Executor executor = new Executor();
+        executor.prepareOlinkDB();
+        executor.build();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Get absolute path to a temporary Olink target database XML document
+     * that points to the individual generated Olink DB files, for webhelp.
+     *
+     * @return Absolute path to the temporary file
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Could not write target DB file.
+     */
+    final String getTargetDB() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        File targetDB = new File(m.getBuildDirectory() + File.separator + &quot;olinkdb-webhelp.xml&quot;);
+
+        try {
+            StringBuilder content = new StringBuilder();
+            content.append(&quot;&lt;?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot;&lt;!DOCTYPE targetset [\n&quot;);
+
+            String targetDbDtd = IOUtils.toString(getClass()
+                    .getResourceAsStream(&quot;/targetdatabase.dtd&quot;));
+            content.append(targetDbDtd).append(&quot;\n&quot;);
+
+            final Set&lt;String&gt; docNames = m.getDocNames();
+
+            for (String docName : docNames) {
+
+/*  &lt;targetsFilename&gt; is ignored with docbkx-tools 2.0.15.
+                String sysId = getBuildDirectory().getAbsolutePath()
+                        + File.separator + docName + &quot;-webhelp.target.db&quot;;
+*/
+                String sysId = m.getBaseDir().getAbsolutePath()
+                        + &quot;/target/docbkx/webhelp/&quot; + docName + &quot;/index.webhelp.target.db&quot;;
+
+                content.append(&quot;&lt;!ENTITY &quot;).append(docName)
+                        .append(&quot; SYSTEM '&quot;).append(sysId).append(&quot;'&gt;\n&quot;);
+            }
+
+            content.append(&quot;]&gt;\n&quot;)
+
+                    .append(&quot;&lt;targetset&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot; &lt;targetsetinfo&gt;Target DB for DocBook content,\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot; for use with webhelp only.&lt;/targetsetinfo&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot; &lt;sitemap&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot;  &lt;dir name='doc'&gt;\n&quot;);
+
+            for (String docName : docNames) {
+                content.append(&quot;   &lt;document targetdoc='&quot;).append(docName).append(&quot;'\n&quot;)
+                        .append(&quot;             baseuri='../&quot;).append(docName).append(&quot;/'&gt;\n&quot;)
+                        .append(&quot;    &amp;&quot;).append(docName).append(&quot;;\n&quot;)
+                        .append(&quot;   &lt;/document&gt;\n&quot;);
+            }
+            content.append(&quot;  &lt;/dir&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot; &lt;/sitemap&gt;\n&quot;)
+                    .append(&quot;&lt;/targetset&gt;\n&quot;);
+
+            FileUtils.writeStringToFile(targetDB, content.toString());
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            throw new MojoExecutionException(
+                    &quot;Failed to write link target database: &quot; + e.getMessage());
+        }
+        return targetDB.getPath();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
+     */
+    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
+
+        /**
+         * Prepare olink target database from DocBook XML sources.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build target database.
+         */
+        void prepareOlinkDB() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+            for (String docName : m.getDocNames()) {
+                ArrayList&lt;Element&gt; cfg = new ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt;();
+                cfg.addAll(m.getBaseConfiguration());
+
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;webhelpAutolabel&quot;), &quot;1&quot;));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;webhelpCustomization&quot;), m.path(m.getWebHelpCustomization())));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;collectXrefTargets&quot;), &quot;only&quot;));
+
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;currentDocid&quot;), docName));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;includes&quot;), docName + &quot;/&quot; + m.getDocumentSrcName()));
+
+/*  &lt;targetsFilename&gt; is ignored with docbkx-tools 2.0.15.
+                cfg.add(element(
+                        name(&quot;targetsFilename&quot;),
+                        FilenameUtils.separatorsToUnix(getBuildDirectory()
+                                .getPath())
+                                + &quot;/&quot;
+                                + docName
+                                + &quot;-webhelp.target.db&quot;));
+*/
+                executeMojo(
+                        plugin(groupId(&quot;com.agilejava.docbkx&quot;),
+                                artifactId(&quot;docbkx-maven-plugin&quot;),
+                                version(m.getDocbkxVersion())),
+                        goal(&quot;generate-webhelp&quot;),
+                        configuration(cfg.toArray(new Element[cfg.size()])),
+                        executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+            }
+        }
+
+        /**
+         * Build documents from DocBook XML sources.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to build the output.
+         */
+        void build() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+            ImageCopier.copyImages(&quot;webhelp&quot;, &quot;&quot;, m.getDocumentSrcName(),
+                    m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory(), m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory());
+
+            for (String docName : m.getDocNames()) {
+                ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt; cfg = new ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt;();
+                cfg.addAll(m.getBaseConfiguration());
+
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;webhelpAutolabel&quot;), &quot;1&quot;));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;webhelpCustomization&quot;),
+                        m.path(m.getWebHelpCustomization())));
+
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;targetDatabaseDocument&quot;), getTargetDB()));
+
+                final File webHelpBase = new File(m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory(), &quot;webhelp&quot;);
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;targetDirectory&quot;), m.path(webHelpBase)));
+
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;currentDocid&quot;), docName));
+                cfg.add(element(name(&quot;includes&quot;), docName + &quot;/&quot; + m.getDocumentSrcName()));
+
+                executeMojo(
+                        plugin(groupId(&quot;com.agilejava.docbkx&quot;),
+                                artifactId(&quot;docbkx-maven-plugin&quot;),
+                                version(m.getDocbkxVersion())),
+                        goal(&quot;generate-webhelp&quot;),
+                        configuration(cfg.toArray(new Element[cfg.size()])),
+                        executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+
+                // Copy CSS and logo into place in the new webhelp output.
+                final File webHelpCss = new File(webHelpBase,
+                        docName + File.separator
+                                + &quot;common&quot; + File.separator
+                                + &quot;css&quot; + File.separator
+                                + &quot;positioning.css&quot;);
+                final File webHelpLogo = new File(webHelpBase,
+                        docName + File.separator
+                                + &quot;common&quot; + File.separator
+                                + &quot;images&quot; + File.separator
+                                + &quot;logo.png&quot;);
+                try {
+                    FileUtils.copyFile(m.getWebHelpCss(), webHelpCss);
+                    FileUtils.copyFile(m.getWebHelpLogo(), webHelpLogo);
+                } catch (IOException ie) {
+                    throw new MojoExecutionException(&quot;Failed to copy file&quot;, ie);
+                }
+            }
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenbuildpackageinfojava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/package-info.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/package-info.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/build/package-info.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+/**
+ * Classes for building output formats.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.build;
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenpackageinfojava"></a>
<div class="modfile"><h4>Modified: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/package-info.java (2241 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/package-info.java        2014-08-11 16:45:24 UTC (rev 2241)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/package-info.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -8,7 +8,7 @@
</span><span class="cx">  * information:
</span><span class="cx">  *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
</span><span class="cx">  *
</span><del>- *     Copyright 2012-2013 ForgeRock AS
</del><ins>+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
</ins><span class="cx">  *
</span><span class="cx">  */
</span><span class="cx"> 
</span><span class="lines">@@ -16,38 +16,10 @@
</span><span class="cx">  * Provides the implementation for building ForgeRock core documentation from &lt;a
</span><span class="cx">  * href=&quot;http://www.docbook.org/tdg51/en/html/docbook.html&quot;&gt;DocBook XML&lt;/a&gt;
</span><span class="cx">  * using &lt;a href=&quot;http://code.google.com/p/docbkx-tools/&quot;&gt;docbkx-tools&lt;/a&gt;.
</span><del>- * &lt;p&gt;
- * Top-level DocBook documents included in the documentation set such as
- * books, articles, and references share a common entry point, which is a file
- * having the name specified by this element.
- * &lt;p&gt;
- * For example, if your documentation set has Release Notes, an Installation
- * Guide, a Developer's Guide, and a Reference, your source layout under the
- * base DocBook XML source directory might look like this, assuming you use
- * the default file name, &lt;code&gt;index.xml&lt;/code&gt;.
</del><span class="cx">  *
</span><del>- * &lt;pre&gt;
- * src/main/docbkx/
- *  dev-guide/
- *   index.xml
- *   ...other files...
- *  install-guide/
- *   index.xml
- *   ...other files...
- *  reference/
- *   index.xml
- *   ...other files...
- *  release-notes/
- *   index.xml
- *   ...other files...
- *  shared/
- *   ...other files...
- * &lt;/pre&gt;
- *
- * The &lt;code&gt;...other files...&lt;/code&gt; can have whatever names you want, as
- * long as the name does not conflict with the file name you set here.
</del><span class="cx">  * &lt;p&gt;
</span><del>- * See the plugin README.md for more information and example specifications
- * for adding the plugin to your Maven project.
</del><ins>+ *
+ * See the plugin README.md for more information
+ * and example specifications for adding the plugin to your Maven project.
</ins><span class="cx">  */
</span><span class="cx"> package org.forgerock.doc.maven;
</span></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenpostHtmljava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/post/Html.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/post/Html.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/post/Html.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,296 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.post;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
+import org.apache.commons.io.FilenameUtils;
+import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.utils.HtmlUtils;
+
+import java.io.File;
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.net.URL;
+import java.util.HashMap;
+
+/**
+ * HTML post-processor for both single-page and chunked HTML formats.
+ */
+public class Html {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public Html(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+
+        outputDirectories = new String[2];
+        outputDirectories[0] = &quot;&quot;;
+        outputDirectories[1] = File.separator + FilenameUtils.getBaseName(m.getDocumentSrcName());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Post-processes HTML formats.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to post-process HTML.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        addScript();
+        addShScripts();
+        addShCss();
+        editBuiltHtml(m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory().getPath() + File.separator + &quot;html&quot;);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Directories where scripts and CSS are to be added.
+     */
+    private String[] outputDirectories;
+
+    /**
+     * Add JavaScript to include in HTML in each document source directory.
+     * See &lt;a href=&quot;http://docbook.sourceforge.net/release/xsl/current/doc/html/html.script.html&quot;
+     * &gt;html.script&lt;/a&gt; for details.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to add script.
+     */
+    void addScript() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+        final URL scriptUrl = getClass().getResource(&quot;/js/&quot; + m.getJavaScriptFileName());
+        String scriptString;
+        try {
+            scriptString = IOUtils.toString(scriptUrl);
+        } catch (IOException ie) {
+            throw new MojoExecutionException(&quot;Failed to read &quot; + scriptUrl, ie);
+        }
+
+        if (scriptString != null) {
+            scriptString = scriptString.replace(&quot;PROJECT_NAME&quot;, m.getProjectName().toLowerCase());
+            scriptString = scriptString.replace(&quot;PROJECT_VERSION&quot;, m.getProjectVersion());
+            scriptString = scriptString.replace(&quot;LATEST_JSON&quot;, m.getLatestJson());
+            scriptString = scriptString.replace(&quot;DOCS_SITE&quot;, m.getDocsSite());
+        } else {
+            throw new MojoExecutionException(scriptUrl + &quot; was empty&quot;);
+        }
+
+        // The html.script parameter should probably take URLs.
+        // When local files are referenced,
+        // the DocBook XSL stylesheets do not copy the .js files.
+        // Instead the files must be copied to the output directories.
+
+        for (final String outputDirectory : outputDirectories) {
+
+            for (final String docName : m.getDocNames()) {
+
+                final File parent = new File(m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory(),
+                        &quot;html&quot; + File.separator + docName + outputDirectory);
+                final File scriptFile = new File(parent, m.getJavaScriptFileName());
+
+                try {
+                    FileUtils.writeStringToFile(scriptFile, scriptString, &quot;UTF-8&quot;);
+                } catch (IOException ie) {
+                    throw new MojoExecutionException(
+                            &quot;Failed to write to &quot; + scriptFile.getPath(), ie);
+                }
+            }
+        }
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * SyntaxHighlighter JavaScript files.
+     */
+    private final String[] shJavaScriptFiles = {
+        &quot;shCore.js&quot;,
+        &quot;shBrushAci.js&quot;,
+        &quot;shBrushBash.js&quot;,
+        &quot;shBrushCsv.js&quot;,
+        &quot;shBrushHttp.js&quot;,
+        &quot;shBrushJava.js&quot;,
+        &quot;shBrushJScript.js&quot;,
+        &quot;shBrushLDIF.js&quot;,
+        &quot;shBrushPlain.js&quot;,
+        &quot;shBrushProperties.js&quot;,
+        &quot;shBrushXml.js&quot;
+    };
+
+    /**
+     * Add SyntaxHighlighter JavaScript files in each HTML document source directory.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to add scripts.
+     */
+    void addShScripts() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+        for (String scriptName : shJavaScriptFiles) {
+            URL scriptUrl = getClass().getResource(&quot;/js/&quot; + scriptName);
+
+            // The html.script parameter should probably take URLs.
+            // When local files are referenced,
+            // the DocBook XSL stylesheets do not copy the .js files.
+            // Instead the files must be copied to the output directories.
+
+            for (final String outputDirectory : outputDirectories) {
+
+                for (final String docName : m.getDocNames()) {
+
+                    final File parent = new File(m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory(),
+                            &quot;html&quot; + File.separator + docName + outputDirectory
+                                    + File.separator + &quot;sh&quot;);
+                    final File scriptFile = new File(parent, scriptName);
+
+                    try {
+                        FileUtils.copyURLToFile(scriptUrl, scriptFile);
+                    } catch (IOException ie) {
+                        throw new MojoExecutionException(
+                                &quot;Failed to write to &quot; + scriptFile.getPath(), ie);
+                    }
+                }
+            }
+        }
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * SyntaxHighlighter CSS files.
+     */
+    private final String[] shCssFiles =
+    {&quot;shCore.css&quot;, &quot;shCoreEclipse.css&quot;, &quot;shThemeEclipse.css&quot;};
+
+    /**
+     * Add SyntaxHighlighter CSS files in each HTML document source directory.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to add scripts.
+     */
+    void addShCss() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+        for (String styleSheetName : shCssFiles) {
+            URL styleSheetUrl = getClass().getResource(&quot;/css/&quot; + styleSheetName);
+
+            // The html.stylesheet parameter should probably take URLs.
+            // When local files are referenced,
+            // the DocBook XSL stylesheets do not copy the .css files.
+            // Instead the files must be copied to the output directories.
+
+            for (final String outputDirectory : outputDirectories) {
+
+                for (final String docName : m.getDocNames()) {
+
+                    final File parent = new File(m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory(),
+                            &quot;html&quot; + File.separator + docName + outputDirectory
+                                    + File.separator + &quot;sh&quot;);
+                    final File styleSheetFile = new File(parent, styleSheetName);
+
+                    try {
+                        FileUtils.copyURLToFile(styleSheetUrl, styleSheetFile);
+                    } catch (IOException ie) {
+                        throw new MojoExecutionException(
+                                &quot;Failed to write to &quot; + styleSheetFile.getPath(), ie);
+                    }
+                }
+            }
+        }
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Edit build single-page and chunked HTML.
+     *
+     * &lt;p&gt;
+     *
+     * The HTML built by docbkx-tools does not currently include the following,
+     * which this method adds.
+     *
+     * &lt;ul&gt;
+     * &lt;li&gt;A DOCTYPE declaration (needed by Internet Explorer to interpret CSS&lt;/li&gt;
+     * &lt;li&gt;JavaScript to to call the SyntaxHighlighter brushes&lt;/li&gt;
+     * &lt;li&gt;A favicon link&lt;/li&gt;
+     * &lt;li&gt;A paragraph about logging issues with a link to JIRA&lt;/li&gt;
+     * &lt;li&gt;JavaScript used by Google Analytics&lt;/li&gt;
+     * &lt;/ul&gt;
+     *
+     * @param htmlDir Directory under which to find HTML output
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Something went wrong when updating HTML.
+     */
+    final void editBuiltHtml(final String htmlDir) throws MojoExecutionException {
+        try {
+            HashMap&lt;String, String&gt; replacements = new HashMap&lt;String, String&gt;();
+
+            String doctype = IOUtils.toString(
+                    getClass().getResourceAsStream(&quot;/starthtml-doctype.txt&quot;), &quot;UTF-8&quot;);
+            replacements.put(&quot;&lt;html&gt;&quot;, doctype);
+
+            String favicon = IOUtils.toString(
+                    getClass().getResourceAsStream(&quot;/endhead-favicon.txt&quot;), &quot;UTF-8&quot;);
+            favicon = favicon.replace(&quot;FAVICON-LINK&quot;, m.getFaviconLink());
+            replacements.put(&quot;&lt;/head&gt;&quot;, favicon);
+
+            String linkToJira = getLinkToJira();
+
+            String gascript = IOUtils.toString(
+                    getClass().getResourceAsStream(&quot;/endbody-ga.txt&quot;), &quot;UTF-8&quot;);
+            gascript = gascript.replace(&quot;ANALYTICS-ID&quot;, m.getGoogleAnalyticsId());
+            replacements.put(&quot;&lt;/body&gt;&quot;, linkToJira + &quot;\n&quot; + gascript);
+
+            HtmlUtils.updateHtml(htmlDir, replacements);
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            throw new MojoExecutionException(
+                    &quot;Failed to update output HTML correctly: &quot; + e.getMessage());
+        }
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Return a &amp;lt;p&amp;gt; containing a link to log a bug in JIRA, depending on the project.
+     * The string is not localized.
+     *
+     * @return &amp;lt;p&amp;gt; containing a link to log a bug in JIRA.
+     */
+    final String getLinkToJira() {
+        String link = &quot;&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;footer\&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;Something wrong on this page? &quot;
+                + &quot;&lt;a href=\&quot;JIRA-URL\&quot;&gt;Log a documentation bug.&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&quot;;
+
+        // https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/JIRA/Creating+Issues+via+direct+HTML+links
+        String jiraURL = &quot;https://bugster.forgerock.org/jira/secure/CreateIssueDetails!init.jspa&quot;;
+
+        if (m.getProjectName().equalsIgnoreCase(&quot;OpenAM&quot;)) {
+            jiraURL += &quot;?pid=10000&amp;components=10007&amp;issuetype=1&quot;;
+        }
+        if (m.getProjectName().equalsIgnoreCase(&quot;OpenDJ&quot;)) {
+            jiraURL += &quot;?pid=10040&amp;components=10132&amp;issuetype=1&quot;;
+        }
+        if (m.getProjectName().equalsIgnoreCase(&quot;OpenICF&quot;)) {
+            jiraURL += &quot;?pid=10041&amp;components=10170&amp;issuetype=1&quot;;
+        }
+        if (m.getProjectName().equalsIgnoreCase(&quot;OpenIDM&quot;)) {
+            jiraURL += &quot;?pid=10020&amp;components=10164&amp;issuetype=1&quot;;
+        }
+        if (m.getProjectName().equalsIgnoreCase(&quot;OpenIG&quot;)) {
+            jiraURL += &quot;?pid=10060&amp;components=10220&amp;issuetype=1&quot;;
+        }
+        if (m.getProjectName().equalsIgnoreCase(&quot;ForgeRock&quot;)) { // Just testing
+            jiraURL += &quot;?pid=10010&amp;issuetype=1&quot;;
+        }
+
+        if (!jiraURL.contains(&quot;pid&quot;)) {
+            link = &quot;&quot;;
+        } else {
+            link = link.replaceFirst(&quot;JIRA-URL&quot;, jiraURL);
+        }
+        return link;
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenpostNoOpjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/post/NoOp.java (0 => 2242)</h4>

+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying

+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.post;
+
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+
+/**
+ * No-op processor for formats that have no post-processing at present.
+ */
+public class NoOp extends AbstractDocbkxMojo {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public NoOp(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Does no post-processing.
+     */
+    public void execute() {
+        // Nothing to do.
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>

<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/Branding.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/Branding.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/Branding.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,83 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.pre;
+
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
+
+/**
+ * Unpack branding elements.
+ * The branding is unpacked from a separate artifact.
+ */
+public class Branding {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public Branding(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Augment the modifiable copy of DocBook XML sources with branding elements.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to unpack branding.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        Executor executor = new Executor();
+        executor.unpack();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
+     */
+    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
+
+        /**
+         * Unpack branding elements from the branding artifact.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to unpack branding.
+         */
+        public void unpack() throws MojoExecutionException {
+            final String outputDir = m.path(m.getBuildDirectory());
+
+            executeMojo(
+                    plugin(
+                            groupId(&quot;org.apache.maven.plugins&quot;),
+                            artifactId(&quot;maven-dependency-plugin&quot;),
+                            version(&quot;2.8&quot;)),
+                    goal(&quot;unpack&quot;),
+                    configuration(
+                            element(&quot;artifactItems&quot;,
+                                    element(&quot;artifactItem&quot;,
+                                            element(&quot;groupId&quot;, m.getBrandingGroupId()),
+                                            element(&quot;artifactId&quot;, m.getBrandingArtifactId()),
+                                            element(&quot;version&quot;, m.getBrandingVersion()),
+                                            element(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;jar&quot;),
+                                            element(&quot;overWrite&quot;, &quot;true&quot;),
+                                            element(&quot;outputDirectory&quot;, outputDir),
+                                            element(&quot;includes&quot;, &quot;**/*.*&quot;)))),
+                    executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenpreCommonContentjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/CommonContent.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/CommonContent.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/CommonContent.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,83 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.pre;
+
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
+
+/**
+ * Augment the modifiable copy DocBook XML sources with common content.
+ * The common content is unpacked from a separate artifact.
+ */
+public class CommonContent {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public CommonContent(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Augment the modifiable copy of DocBook XML sources with common content.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to unpack common content.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        Executor executor = new Executor();
+        executor.unpack();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
+     */
+    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
+
+        /**
+         * Unpack common content from the common content artifact.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to unpack common content.
+         */
+        public void unpack() throws MojoExecutionException {
+            final String outputDir = m.path(m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory());
+
+            executeMojo(
+                    plugin(
+                            groupId(&quot;org.apache.maven.plugins&quot;),
+                            artifactId(&quot;maven-dependency-plugin&quot;),
+                            version(&quot;2.8&quot;)),
+                    goal(&quot;unpack&quot;),
+                    configuration(
+                            element(&quot;artifactItems&quot;,
+                                    element(&quot;artifactItem&quot;,
+                                            element(&quot;groupId&quot;, m.getCommonContentGroupId()),
+                                            element(&quot;artifactId&quot;, m.getCommonContentArtifactId()),
+                                            element(&quot;version&quot;, m.getCommonContentVersion()),
+                                            element(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;jar&quot;),
+                                            element(&quot;overWrite&quot;, &quot;true&quot;),
+                                            element(&quot;outputDirectory&quot;, outputDir),
+                                            element(&quot;includes&quot;, &quot;**/*.*&quot;)))),
+                    executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenpreCurrentDocIdjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/CurrentDocId.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/CurrentDocId.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/CurrentDocId.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,81 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.pre;
+
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.codehaus.plexus.util.DirectoryScanner;
+import org.codehaus.plexus.util.FileUtils;
+import org.codehaus.plexus.util.StringUtils;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+
+import java.io.File;
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.util.Set;
+
+/**
+ * Replace {@code CURRENT.DOCID#} with the current document ID + #.
+ * The current document ID is used to resolve olinks.
+ */
+public class CurrentDocId {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public CurrentDocId(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    private static final String CURRENT_DOCID = &quot;CURRENT.DOCID#&quot;;
+
+    /**
+     * Replace {@code CURRENT.DOCID#} with the current document ID + #.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to handle an XML source file.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+        final Set&lt;String&gt; docNames = m.getDocNames();
+        final String sourceEncoding = m.getProject().getProperties()
+                .getProperty(&quot;project.build.sourceEncoding&quot;, &quot;UTF-8&quot;);
+
+        for (String docName : docNames) {
+
+            File documentDirectory = new File(m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory(), docName);
+            DirectoryScanner scanner = new DirectoryScanner();
+            scanner.setBasedir(documentDirectory);
+            scanner.setIncludes(new String[] { &quot;**/*.xml&quot; });
+            scanner.addDefaultExcludes();
+            scanner.scan();
+
+            for (String docFile : scanner.getIncludedFiles()) {
+                try {
+                    File documentFile = new File(documentDirectory, docFile);
+                    String content = FileUtils.fileRead(documentFile, sourceEncoding);
+                    String newContent = StringUtils.replace(content, CURRENT_DOCID, docName + &quot;#&quot;);
+                    FileUtils.fileWrite(documentFile, sourceEncoding, newContent);
+                } catch (IOException e) {
+                    throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
+                }
+            }
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenpreCustomCssjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/CustomCss.java (0 => 2242)</h4>

+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/CustomCss.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)

</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
