+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.pre;
+
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.utils.HtmlUtils;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+
+/**
+ * Add custom CSS for the normal, non-release build.
+ */
+public class CustomCss {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public CustomCss(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Add custom CSS to the modifiable copy of DocBook XML sources.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to add CSS.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        try {
+            HtmlUtils.addCustomCss(
+                    m.getPreSiteCss(),
+                    m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory(),
+                    m.getDocumentSrcName());
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenpreDpijava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/Dpi.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/Dpi.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/Dpi.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,71 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2013-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.pre;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
+import org.apache.commons.io.filefilter.TrueFileFilter;
+import org.apache.commons.io.filefilter.WildcardFileFilter;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.utils.PngUtils;
+
+import java.io.File;
+import java.io.IOException;
+
+/**
+ * Set DPI on .png images in the modifiable copy of the sources.
+ *
+ * &lt;p&gt;
+ *
+ * This class transforms the .png images in place.
+ */
+public class Dpi {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public Dpi(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Set DPI on .png images in the modifiable copy of the sources.
+     * Default: 160 DPI.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to edit image file.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+        try {
+
+            for (File image : FileUtils.listFiles(
+                    m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory(),
+                    new WildcardFileFilter(&quot;*.png&quot;),
+                    TrueFileFilter.INSTANCE)) {
+                PngUtils.setSafeDpi(image, m.getMaxImageHeightInInches());
+            }
+
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenpreFilterjavafromrev2144forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenFilterPreSiteBuildMojojava"></a>
<div class="copfile"><h4>Copied: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/Filter.java (from rev 2144, forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/FilterPreSiteBuildMojo.java) (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/Filter.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/Filter.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,111 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2013-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.pre;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.utils.FilteredFileCopier;
+import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
+
+import java.io.File;
+import java.io.IOException;
+
+/**
+ * Apply Maven resource filtering to the modifiable copy of DocBook XML sources,
+ * replacing Maven properties such as {@code ${myProperty}} with their values.
+ */
+public class Filter {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public Filter(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+        sourceDirectory = m.path(m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory());
+        tempOutputDirectory = new File(m.getBuildDirectory(), &quot;docbkx-filtered&quot;);
+        filteredOutputDirectory = m.path(tempOutputDirectory);
+    }
+
+    // Filter the sources in the modifiable copy.
+    private final String sourceDirectory;
+
+    // Filter to a temporary directory.
+    private final File tempOutputDirectory;
+    private final String filteredOutputDirectory;
+
+    /**
+     * Apply Maven resource filtering to the copy of DocBook XML sources.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to filter a file.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+        // Filter to a temporary directory...
+        Executor exec = new Executor();
+        exec.filter();
+
+        // ...and then overwrite the copy of sources with filtered files.
+        try {
+            FilteredFileCopier.copyOthers(&quot;.xml&quot;, m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory(), tempOutputDirectory);
+            FileUtils.copyDirectory(tempOutputDirectory, m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory());
+            FileUtils.deleteDirectory(tempOutputDirectory);
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
+        }
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
+     */
+    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
+
+        /**
+         * Filter DocBook XML source files.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to filter a file.
+         */
+        void filter() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+            executeMojo(
+                    plugin(
+                            groupId(&quot;org.apache.maven.plugins&quot;),
+                            artifactId(&quot;maven-resources-plugin&quot;),
+                            version(m.getResourcesVersion())),
+                    goal(&quot;copy-resources&quot;),
+                    configuration(
+                            element(name(&quot;outputDirectory&quot;), filteredOutputDirectory),
+                            element(name(&quot;resources&quot;),
+                                    element(name(&quot;resource&quot;),
+                                            element(name(&quot;directory&quot;), sourceDirectory),
+                                            element(name(&quot;filtering&quot;), &quot;true&quot;),
+                                            element(name(&quot;includes&quot;),
+                                                    element(name(&quot;include&quot;), &quot;**/*.xml&quot;))),
+                                    element(name(&quot;resource&quot;),
+                                            element(name(&quot;directory&quot;), sourceDirectory),
+                                            element(name(&quot;filtering&quot;), &quot;false&quot;),
+                                            element(name(&quot;excludes&quot;),
+                                                    element(name(&quot;exclude&quot;), &quot;**/*.xml&quot;))))),
+                    executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenpreFopjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/Fop.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/Fop.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/Fop.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,199 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.pre;
+
+import static org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor.element;
+import static org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor.name;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
+
+import java.io.File;
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.net.URL;
+
+/**
+ * Prepare fonts for use with Apache FOP.
+ */
+public final class Fop {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public Fop(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Prepare fonts for use with Apache FOP.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to prepare to use FOP.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        Executor executor = new Executor();
+        executor.copyFonts();
+        executor.generateFontMetrics();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Return a fonts element that includes all the custom fonts.
+     *
+     * @param fontDir Directory containing the custom fonts.
+     * @return Fonts element.
+     */
+    public static MojoExecutor.Element getFontsElement(final String fontDir) {
+        return element(
+                name(&quot;fonts&quot;),
+                element(name(&quot;font&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;name&quot;), &quot;DejaVuSans&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;style&quot;), &quot;normal&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;weight&quot;), &quot;normal&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;embedFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSans.ttf&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;metricsFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSans-metrics.xml&quot;)),
+                element(name(&quot;font&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;name&quot;), &quot;DejaVuSans&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;style&quot;), &quot;normal&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;weight&quot;), &quot;bold&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;embedFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSansCondensed-Bold.ttf&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;metricsFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSansCondensed-Bold-metrics.xml&quot;)),
+                element(name(&quot;font&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;name&quot;), &quot;DejaVuSans&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;style&quot;), &quot;italic&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;weight&quot;), &quot;normal&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;embedFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSans-Oblique.ttf&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;metricsFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSans-Oblique-metrics.xml&quot;)),
+                element(name(&quot;font&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;name&quot;), &quot;DejaVuSans&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;style&quot;), &quot;italic&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;weight&quot;), &quot;bold&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;embedFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSansCondensed-BoldOblique.ttf&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;metricsFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSansCondensed-BoldOblique-metrics.xml&quot;)),
+                element(name(&quot;font&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;name&quot;), &quot;DejaVuSansMono&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;style&quot;), &quot;normal&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;weight&quot;), &quot;normal&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;embedFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSansMono.ttf&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;metricsFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSansMono-metrics.xml&quot;)),
+                element(name(&quot;font&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;name&quot;), &quot;DejaVuSansMono&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;style&quot;), &quot;normal&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;weight&quot;), &quot;bold&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;embedFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSansMono-Bold.ttf&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;metricsFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSansMono-Bold-metrics.xml&quot;)),
+                element(name(&quot;font&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;name&quot;), &quot;DejaVuSansMono&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;style&quot;), &quot;italic&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;weight&quot;), &quot;normal&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;embedFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSansMono-Oblique.ttf&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;metricsFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSansMono-Oblique-metrics.xml&quot;)),
+                element(name(&quot;font&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;name&quot;), &quot;DejaVuSansMono&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;style&quot;), &quot;italic&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;weight&quot;), &quot;bold&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;embedFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSansMono-BoldOblique.ttf&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;metricsFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSansMono-BoldOblique-metrics.xml&quot;)),
+                element(name(&quot;font&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;name&quot;), &quot;DejaVuSerif&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;style&quot;), &quot;normal&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;weight&quot;), &quot;normal&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;embedFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSerif.ttf&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;metricsFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSerif-metrics.xml&quot;)),
+                element(name(&quot;font&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;name&quot;), &quot;DejaVuSerif&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;style&quot;), &quot;normal&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;weight&quot;), &quot;bold&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;embedFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSerifCondensed-Bold.ttf&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;metricsFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSerifCondensed-Bold-metrics.xml&quot;)),
+                element(name(&quot;font&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;name&quot;), &quot;DejaVuSerif&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;style&quot;), &quot;italic&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;weight&quot;), &quot;normal&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;embedFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSerif-Italic.ttf&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;metricsFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSerif-Italic-metrics.xml&quot;)),
+                element(name(&quot;font&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;name&quot;), &quot;DejaVuSerif&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;style&quot;), &quot;italic&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;weight&quot;), &quot;bold&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;embedFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSerifCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf&quot;),
+                        element(name(&quot;metricsFile&quot;), fontDir + &quot;/DejaVuSerifCondensed-BoldItalic-metrics.xml&quot;)));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
+     */
+    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
+
+        /**
+         * Copy fonts for use when generating FO output.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to copy fonts.
+         */
+        public void copyFonts() throws MojoExecutionException {
+            String[] fonts = {&quot;/fonts/DejaVuSans-Oblique.ttf&quot;,
+                &quot;/fonts/DejaVuSans.ttf&quot;,
+                &quot;/fonts/DejaVuSansCondensed-Bold.ttf&quot;,
+                &quot;/fonts/DejaVuSansCondensed-BoldOblique.ttf&quot;,
+                &quot;/fonts/DejaVuSansMono-Bold.ttf&quot;,
+                &quot;/fonts/DejaVuSansMono-BoldOblique.ttf&quot;,
+                &quot;/fonts/DejaVuSansMono-Oblique.ttf&quot;,
+                &quot;/fonts/DejaVuSansMono.ttf&quot;,
+                &quot;/fonts/DejaVuSerif-Italic.ttf&quot;,
+                &quot;/fonts/DejaVuSerif.ttf&quot;,
+                &quot;/fonts/DejaVuSerifCondensed-Bold.ttf&quot;,
+                &quot;/fonts/DejaVuSerifCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf&quot;};
+
+            for (String font : fonts) {
+                final URL source = getClass().getResource(font);
+                final File destination = new File(
+                        m.getBuildDirectory() + font.replaceAll(&quot;/&quot;, File.separator));
+                try {
+                    FileUtils.copyURLToFile(source, destination);
+                } catch (IOException e) {
+                    throw new MojoExecutionException(
+                            &quot;Failed to copy file: &quot; + font + &quot;. &quot; + e.getMessage());
+                }
+            }
+        }
+
+        /**
+         * Generate font metrics files.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to generate font metrics.
+         */
+        public void generateFontMetrics() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+            final String fontsDir = m.path(m.getFontsDirectory());
+
+            executeMojo(
+                    plugin(groupId(&quot;com.agilejava.docbkx&quot;),
+                            artifactId(&quot;docbkx-fop-support&quot;),
+                            version(m.getDocbkxVersion())),
+                    goal(&quot;generate&quot;),
+                    configuration(element(name(&quot;ansi&quot;), m.useAnsi()),
+                            element(name(&quot;sourceDirectory&quot;), fontsDir),
+                            element(name(&quot;targetDirectory&quot;), fontsDir)),
+                    executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenpreImageDatajava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/ImageData.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/ImageData.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/ImageData.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,69 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2013-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.pre;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.filefilter.FileFilterUtils;
+import org.apache.commons.io.filefilter.HiddenFileFilter;
+import org.apache.commons.io.filefilter.IOFileFilter;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.utils.ImageDataTransformer;
+
+import java.io.FileFilter;
+import java.io.IOException;
+
+/**
+ * Edit {@code &amp;lt;imagedata&amp;gt;} elements in DocBook XML sources.
+ */
+public class ImageData {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public ImageData(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Edit {@code &amp;lt;imagedata&amp;gt;} elements in the copy of DocBook XML sources.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to update an XML file.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        // Match normal directories, and XML files.
+        IOFileFilter dirFilter = FileFilterUtils
+                .and(FileFilterUtils.directoryFileFilter(),
+                        HiddenFileFilter.VISIBLE);
+        IOFileFilter fileFilter = FileFilterUtils.and(
+                FileFilterUtils.fileFileFilter(),
+                FileFilterUtils.suffixFileFilter(&quot;.xml&quot;));
+        FileFilter filterToMatch = FileFilterUtils.or(dirFilter, fileFilter);
+
+        // Update XML files.
+        ImageDataTransformer idt = new ImageDataTransformer(filterToMatch);
+        try {
+            idt.update(m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory());
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenpreJCitejavafromrev2144forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenJCiteBuildMojojava"></a>
<div class="copfile"><h4>Copied: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/JCite.java (from rev 2144, forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/JCiteBuildMojo.java) (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/JCite.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/JCite.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,172 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2013-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.pre;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
+import org.apache.commons.io.FilenameUtils;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.codehaus.plexus.util.xml.Xpp3Dom;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.utils.FilteredFileCopier;
+import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
+
+import java.io.File;
+import java.io.IOException;
+
+/**
+ * Use &lt;a href=&quot;http://arrenbrecht.ch/jcite/&quot;&gt;JCite&lt;/a&gt; to quote Java code.
+ *
+ * &lt;p&gt;
+ *
+ * This class generates source including the citations.
+ * For example, if your DocBook source file includes
+ * the following &amp;lt;programlisting&amp;gt;:
+ *
+ * &lt;pre&gt;
+ * &amp;lt;programlisting language=&amp;quot;java&amp;quot;
+ * &amp;gt;[jcp:org.forgerock.doc.jcite.test.Test:--- mainMethod]&amp;lt;/programlisting&amp;gt;
+ * &lt;/pre&gt;
+ *
+ * &lt;p&gt;
+ *
+ * Then this class replaces the citation with the code
+ * in between {@code // --- mainMethod} comments,
+ * suitable for inclusion in XML,
+ * and leaves the new file with the modifiable copy of the sources
+ * for further processing.
+ */
+public class JCite {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public JCite(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+        sourceDir = m.path(m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory());
+        tempOutputDirectory = new File(m.getBuildDirectory(), &quot;docbkx-jcite&quot;);
+        outputDir = m.path(tempOutputDirectory);
+    }
+
+    // JCite the sources in the modifiable copy.
+    private final String sourceDir;
+
+    // JCite to a temporary directory.
+    private final File tempOutputDirectory;
+    private final String outputDir;
+
+    /**
+     * Run JCite on the XML source files.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to run JCite.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+        // JCite to a temporary directory...
+        Executor exec = new Executor();
+        exec.runJCite();
+
+        // ...and then overwrite the copy of sources with the new files.
+        try {
+            FilteredFileCopier.copyOthers(
+                    &quot;.xml&quot;, m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory(), tempOutputDirectory);
+            FileUtils.copyDirectory(tempOutputDirectory, m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory());
+            FileUtils.deleteDirectory(tempOutputDirectory);
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
+        }
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
+     */
+    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
+
+        /**
+         * Run JCite on the DocBook XML source files.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to run JCite.
+         */
+        void runJCite() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+            // mojo-executor lacks fluent support for element attributes.
+            // You can hack around this by including attributes
+            // in the name of elements without children.
+            // But the hack does not work for elements with children:
+            // SAX barfs on closing tags containing a bunch of attributes.
+            Xpp3Dom mkdir = new Xpp3Dom(&quot;mkdir&quot;);
+            mkdir.setAttribute(&quot;dir&quot;, outputDir);
+
+            Xpp3Dom taskdef = new Xpp3Dom(&quot;taskdef&quot;);
+            taskdef.setAttribute(&quot;name&quot;, &quot;jcite&quot;);
+            taskdef.setAttribute(&quot;classname&quot;, &quot;ch.arrenbrecht.jcite.JCiteTask&quot;);
+            taskdef.setAttribute(&quot;classpathref&quot;, &quot;maven.plugin.classpath&quot;);
+
+            Xpp3Dom jcite = new Xpp3Dom(&quot;jcite&quot;);
+            jcite.setAttribute(&quot;srcdir&quot;, sourceDir);
+            jcite.setAttribute(&quot;destdir&quot;, outputDir);
+
+            // Might have multiple paths to sources.
+            Xpp3Dom sourcepath = new Xpp3Dom(&quot;sourcepath&quot;);
+            if (m.getJCiteSourcePaths() != null &amp;&amp; !m.getJCiteSourcePaths().isEmpty()) {
+                for (File sourcePath : m.getJCiteSourcePaths()) {
+                    String location = FilenameUtils
+                            .separatorsToSystem(sourcePath.getPath());
+                    Xpp3Dom pathelement = new Xpp3Dom(&quot;pathelement&quot;);
+                    pathelement.setAttribute(&quot;location&quot;, location);
+                    sourcepath.addChild(pathelement);
+                }
+            } else { // No source path defined. Try src/main/java.
+                Xpp3Dom pathelement = new Xpp3Dom(&quot;pathelement&quot;);
+                pathelement.setAttribute(&quot;location&quot;, &quot;src/main/java&quot;);
+                sourcepath.addChild(pathelement);
+            }
+            jcite.addChild(sourcepath);
+
+            Xpp3Dom include = new Xpp3Dom(&quot;include&quot;);
+            include.setAttribute(&quot;name&quot;, &quot;**/*.xml&quot;);
+            jcite.addChild(include);
+
+            Xpp3Dom target = new Xpp3Dom(&quot;target&quot;);
+            target.addChild(mkdir);
+            target.addChild(taskdef);
+            target.addChild(jcite);
+
+            Xpp3Dom configuration = new Xpp3Dom(&quot;configuration&quot;);
+            configuration.addChild(target);
+
+            executeMojo(
+                    plugin(
+                            groupId(&quot;org.apache.maven.plugins&quot;),
+                            artifactId(&quot;maven-antrun-plugin&quot;),
+                            version(&quot;1.7&quot;),
+                            dependencies(
+                                    dependency(
+                                    // See https://code.google.com/r/markcraig-jcite/.
+                                            groupId(&quot;org.mcraig&quot;),
+                                            artifactId(&quot;jcite&quot;),
+                                            version(m.getJCiteVersion())))),
+                    goal(&quot;run&quot;),
+                    configuration,
+                    executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenpreModifiableCopyjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/ModifiableCopy.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/ModifiableCopy.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/ModifiableCopy.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,60 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.pre;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+
+import java.io.File;
+import java.io.IOException;
+
+/**
+ * Make a modifiable copy of the documentation source files,
+ * rather than working directly on the original source files.
+ */
+public class ModifiableCopy {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public ModifiableCopy(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Make a modifiable copy of the original DocBook XML source files.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to copy sources.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+        final File sourceDir = m.getDocbkxSourceDirectory();
+        final File outputDir = m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory();
+
+        try {
+            FileUtils.copyDirectory(sourceDir, outputDir);
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            throw new MojoExecutionException(&quot;Failed to copy sources&quot;, e);
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenprePlantUmljava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/PlantUml.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/PlantUml.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/pre/PlantUml.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,96 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2013-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.pre;
+
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
+
+/**
+ * Use &lt;a href=&quot;http://plantuml.sourceforge.net/&quot;&gt;PlantUML&lt;/a&gt; to generate images.
+ *
+ * &lt;p&gt;
+ *
+ * This class expects .txt files in the DocBook XML sources
+ * that contain PlantUML diagrams.
+ *
+ * &lt;p&gt;
+ *
+ * It transforms the files to images in the same directories as the files.
+ */
+public class PlantUml {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public PlantUml(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Run PlantUML on .txt files in the DocBook source files.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to run PlantUML.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+        // JCite to a temporary directory...
+        Executor exec = new Executor();
+        exec.runPlantUml();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
+     */
+    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
+
+        /**
+         * Run PlantUML on .txt files in the DocBook source files.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to run PlantUml.
+         */
+        void runPlantUml() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+            final String directory = m.path(m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory());
+
+            executeMojo(
+                    plugin(
+                            groupId(&quot;com.github.jeluard&quot;),
+                            artifactId(&quot;plantuml-maven-plugin&quot;),
+                            version(&quot;1.0&quot;),
+                            dependencies(
+                                    dependency(
+                                            groupId(&quot;net.sourceforge.plantuml&quot;),
+                                            artifactId(&quot;plantuml&quot;),
+                                            version(m.getPlantUmlVersion())))),
+                    goal(&quot;generate&quot;),
+                    configuration(
+                            element(name(&quot;sourceFiles&quot;),
+                                    element(name(&quot;directory&quot;), directory),
+                                    element(name(&quot;includes&quot;),
+                                            element(name(&quot;include&quot;), &quot;**/*.txt&quot;))),
+                            element(name(&quot;outputInSourceDirectory&quot;), &quot;true&quot;),
+                            element(name(&quot;verbose&quot;), &quot;true&quot;)),
+                    executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenprepackageinfojava"></a>

<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/Css.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/Css.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/Css.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,65 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.release;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+
+import java.io.File;
+import java.io.IOException;
+
+/**
+ * Replace CSS in release HTML.
+ */
+public class Css {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public Css(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Replace CSS in release HTML.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to replace CSS.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+        final File newCss = m.getReleaseCss();
+        final File dir = new File(m.getReleaseVersionPath());
+        final String[] ext = {&quot;css&quot;};
+        final boolean isRecursive = true;
+
+        for (File oldCss : FileUtils.listFiles(dir, ext, isRecursive)) {
+            if (m.getPreSiteCss().getName().equals(oldCss.getName())) {
+                try {
+                    FileUtils.copyFile(newCss, oldCss);
+                } catch (IOException e) {
+                    throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
+                }
+            }
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenreleaseFaviconjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/Favicon.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/Favicon.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/Favicon.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,63 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.release;
+
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.utils.HtmlUtils;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.util.HashMap;
+
+/**
+ * Fix favicon links in release HTML.
+ */
+public class Favicon {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public Favicon(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Fix favicon links in release HTML.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to fix links.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+        HashMap&lt;String, String&gt; replacements = new HashMap&lt;String, String&gt;();
+        final String oldFaviconLink = m.getFaviconLink();
+        final String newFaviconLink = m.getReleaseFaviconLink();
+
+        if (!oldFaviconLink.equalsIgnoreCase(newFaviconLink)) {
+            replacements.put(oldFaviconLink, newFaviconLink);
+            try {
+                HtmlUtils.updateHtml(m.getReleaseVersionPath(), replacements);
+            } catch (IOException e) {
+                throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
+            }
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenreleaseIndexHtmljava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/IndexHtml.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/IndexHtml.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/IndexHtml.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,65 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.release;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
+import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+
+import java.io.File;
+import java.io.IOException;
+
+/**
+ * Add an index.html file to the release layout.
+ */
+public class IndexHtml {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public IndexHtml(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Add an index.html file to the release layout.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to copy file.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        if (!m.keepCustomIndexHtml()) {
+            final File indexHtml = new File(m.getReleaseVersionPath() + File.separator + &quot;index.html&quot;);
+            FileUtils.deleteQuietly(indexHtml);
+
+            try {
+                String content = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource(&quot;/dfo.index.html&quot;), &quot;UTF-8&quot;);
+                content = content.replace(&quot;PRODUCT&quot;, m.getProjectName().toLowerCase());
+                content = content.replace(&quot;VERSION&quot;, m.getReleaseVersion());
+
+                FileUtils.writeStringToFile(indexHtml, content, &quot;UTF-8&quot;);
+            } catch (IOException e) {
+                throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
+            }
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenreleaseLayoutjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/Layout.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/Layout.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/Layout.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,117 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.release;
+
+import static org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor.element;
+import static org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor.name;
+
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
+
+import java.util.ArrayList;
+import java.util.List;
+
+/**
+ * Lay out built documents,
+ * by default under {@code ${project.build.directory}/release/version}.
+ *
+ * &lt;p&gt;
+ *
+ * Currently only HTML and PDF are released.
+ */
+public class Layout {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public Layout(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Lay out built documents.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to layout site.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        Executor executor = new Executor();
+        executor.layout();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Get element specifying built documents to copy to the release directory.
+     *
+     * &lt;p&gt;
+     *
+     * Currently only HTML and PDF are released.
+     *
+     * @return Compound element specifying built documents to copy.
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Something went wrong getting document names.
+     */
+    private MojoExecutor.Element getResources() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+        ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt; r = new ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt;();
+        final List&lt;String&gt; formats = m.getFormats();
+        final String outputDir = m.path(m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory());
+
+        if (formats.contains(&quot;html&quot;)) {
+            r.add(element(name(&quot;resource&quot;),
+                    element(name(&quot;directory&quot;), outputDir + &quot;/html/&quot;)));
+        }
+
+        if (formats.contains(&quot;pdf&quot;)) {
+            r.add(element(name(&quot;resource&quot;),
+                    element(name(&quot;directory&quot;), outputDir + &quot;/pdf/&quot;),
+                    element(name(&quot;includes&quot;),
+                            element(name(&quot;include&quot;), &quot;**/*.pdf&quot;))));
+        }
+
+        return element(&quot;resources&quot;, r.toArray(new MojoExecutor.Element[r.size()]));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
+     */
+    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
+
+        /**
+         * Lay out built documents.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to lay out documents.
+         */
+        public void layout() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+            executeMojo(
+                    plugin(groupId(&quot;org.apache.maven.plugins&quot;),
+                            artifactId(&quot;maven-resources-plugin&quot;),
+                            version(m.getResourcesVersion())),
+                    goal(&quot;copy-resources&quot;),
+                    configuration(
+                            element(name(&quot;encoding&quot;), &quot;UTF-8&quot;),
+                            element(name(&quot;outputDirectory&quot;),
+                                    m.path(m.getReleaseDirectory()) + &quot;/&quot; + m.getReleaseVersion()),
+                            getResources()),
+                    executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenreleasePdfNamesjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/PdfNames.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/PdfNames.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/PdfNames.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,58 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.release;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+
+import java.io.File;
+
+/**
+ * Rename PDF files in the release layout.
+ */
+public class PdfNames {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public PdfNames(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Rename PDF files in the release layout.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to rename files.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        final File dir = new File(m.getReleaseVersionPath());
+        final String[] ext = {&quot;pdf&quot;};
+
+        for (File pdf : FileUtils.listFiles(dir, ext, false)) { // Not recursive
+            String name = pdf.getName().replaceFirst(&quot;-&quot;, &quot;-&quot; + m.getReleaseVersion() + &quot;-&quot;);
+            if (!pdf.renameTo(new File(pdf.getParent() + File.separator + name))) {
+                throw new MojoExecutionException(&quot;Failed to rename PDF: &quot; + name);
+            }
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenreleaseZipjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/Zip.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/Zip.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/Zip.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,102 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.release;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
+
+import java.io.File;
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.net.URL;
+
+/**
+ * Zip release documents if configured to do so.
+ *
+ * &lt;p&gt;
+ *
+ * This zips the release layout only on one level,
+ * and does not handle assembly of multiple zips
+ * into a single documentation set .zip.
+ */
+public class Zip {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public Zip(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Zip release documents.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to zip documents.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        Executor executor = new Executor();
+        executor.zip();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
+     */
+    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
+
+        /**
+         * Zip release documents.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to zip documents.
+         */
+        public void zip() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+            if (!m.doBuildReleaseZip()) {
+                return;
+            }
+
+            final URL resource = getClass().getResource(&quot;/zip.xml&quot;);
+            final File assembly = new File(m.getBuildDirectory(), &quot;assembly.xml&quot;);
+
+            try {
+                FileUtils.copyURLToFile(resource, assembly);
+            } catch (IOException e) {
+                throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
+            }
+
+
+            final String finalName = m.getProjectName() + &quot;-&quot; + m.getReleaseVersion();
+
+            executeMojo(
+                    plugin(
+                            groupId(&quot;org.apache.maven.plugins&quot;),
+                            artifactId(&quot;maven-assembly-plugin&quot;),
+                            version(&quot;2.4&quot;)),
+                    goal(&quot;single&quot;),
+                    configuration(
+                            element(name(&quot;finalName&quot;), finalName),
+                            element(name(&quot;descriptors&quot;),
+                                    element(name(&quot;descriptor&quot;), m.path(assembly)))),
+                    executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavenreleasepackageinfojava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/package-info.java (0 => 2242)</h4>

+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/release/package-info.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+/**
+ * Classes for preparing the release documents.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.release;
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavensiteHtaccessjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/site/Htaccess.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/site/Htaccess.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/site/Htaccess.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,61 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.site;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.utils.HtmlUtils;
+
+import java.io.File;
+import java.io.IOException;
+
+/**
+ * Add {@code .htaccess} file to the site layout.
+ */
+public class Htaccess {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public Htaccess(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Add {@code .htaccess} file to the site layout.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to copy file.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        final String layoutDir = m.getSiteDirectory().getPath() + File.separator + &quot;doc&quot;;
+        final File htaccess = new File(m.getBuildDirectory().getPath() + File.separator + &quot;.htaccess&quot;);
+
+        FileUtils.deleteQuietly(htaccess);
+        try {
+            FileUtils.copyURLToFile(getClass().getResource(&quot;/.htaccess&quot;), htaccess);
+            HtmlUtils.addHtaccess(layoutDir, htaccess);
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            throw new MojoExecutionException(&quot;Failed to copy .htaccess: &quot; + e.getMessage(), e);
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavensiteLayoutjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/site/Layout.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/site/Layout.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/site/Layout.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,160 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.site;
+
+import static org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor.element;
+import static org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor.name;
+
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
+
+import java.util.ArrayList;
+import java.util.List;
+
+/**
+ * Lay out built documents,
+ * by default under {@code ${project.build.directory}/site/doc/}.
+ */
+public class Layout {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public Layout(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Lay out built documents.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to layout site.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        Executor executor = new Executor();
+        executor.layout();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Get element specifying built documents to copy to the site directory.
+     *
+     * &lt;p&gt;
+     *
+     * Man pages are not currently copied anywhere.
+     *
+     * &lt;p&gt;
+     *
+     * Webhelp is handled separately.
+     *
+     * @return Compound element specifying built documents to copy.
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Something went wrong getting document names.
+     */
+    private MojoExecutor.Element getResources() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+        ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt; r = new ArrayList&lt;MojoExecutor.Element&gt;();
+
+        final List&lt;String&gt; formats = m.getFormats();
+        final String outputDir = m.path(m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory());
+
+        if (formats.contains(&quot;epub&quot;)) {
+            r.add(element(name(&quot;resource&quot;),
+                    element(name(&quot;directory&quot;), outputDir + &quot;/epub/&quot;),
+                    element(name(&quot;includes&quot;),
+                            element(name(&quot;include&quot;), &quot;**/*.epub&quot;))));
+        }
+
+        if (formats.contains(&quot;html&quot;)) {
+            r.add(element(name(&quot;resource&quot;),
+                    element(name(&quot;directory&quot;), outputDir + &quot;/html/&quot;)));
+        }
+
+        // Man pages are not currently copied anywhere.
+
+        if (formats.contains(&quot;pdf&quot;)) {
+            r.add(element(name(&quot;resource&quot;),
+                    element(name(&quot;directory&quot;), outputDir + &quot;/pdf/&quot;),
+                    element(name(&quot;includes&quot;),
+                            element(name(&quot;include&quot;), &quot;**/*.pdf&quot;))));
+        }
+
+        if (formats.contains(&quot;rtf&quot;)) {
+            r.add(element(name(&quot;resource&quot;),
+                    element(name(&quot;directory&quot;), outputDir + &quot;/rtf/&quot;),
+                    element(name(&quot;includes&quot;),
+                            element(name(&quot;include&quot;), &quot;**/*.rtf&quot;))));
+        }
+
+        // Webhelp is handled separately.
+
+        return element(&quot;resources&quot;, r.toArray(new MojoExecutor.Element[r.size()]));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
+     */
+    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
+
+        /**
+         * Lay out built documents.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to lay out documents.
+         */
+        public void layout() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+            final String siteDocDirectory = m.path(m.getSiteDirectory()) + &quot;/doc&quot;;
+
+            executeMojo(
+                    plugin(groupId(&quot;org.apache.maven.plugins&quot;),
+                            artifactId(&quot;maven-resources-plugin&quot;),
+                            version(m.getResourcesVersion())),
+                    goal(&quot;copy-resources&quot;),
+                    configuration(element(name(&quot;encoding&quot;), &quot;UTF-8&quot;),
+                            element(name(&quot;outputDirectory&quot;), siteDocDirectory),
+                            getResources()),
+                    executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+
+            // The webhelp directory needs to be copied in its entirety
+            // to avoid overwriting other HTML.
+
+            if (m.getFormats().contains(&quot;webhelp&quot;)) {
+
+                // 2.0.15 does not allow &lt;webhelpBaseDir&gt; to be set,
+                // so the output location is hard-coded for now.
+                final String webHelpDir = m.path(m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory()) + &quot;/webhelp&quot;;
+
+                executeMojo(
+                        plugin(groupId(&quot;org.apache.maven.plugins&quot;),
+                                artifactId(&quot;maven-resources-plugin&quot;),
+                                version(m.getResourcesVersion())),
+                        goal(&quot;copy-resources&quot;),
+                        configuration(element(name(&quot;encoding&quot;), &quot;UTF-8&quot;),
+                                element(name(&quot;outputDirectory&quot;), siteDocDirectory + &quot;/webhelp&quot;),
+                                element(name(&quot;resources&quot;),
+                                        element(name(&quot;resource&quot;),
+                                                element(name(&quot;directory&quot;), webHelpDir),
+                                                element(name(&quot;excludes&quot;),
+                                                        element(name(&quot;exclude&quot;), &quot;**/*.target.db&quot;))))),
+                        executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+            }
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavensiteLinkTestjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/site/LinkTest.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/site/LinkTest.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/site/LinkTest.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,100 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.site;
+
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
+
+import java.io.File;
+
+/**
+ * Test links in pre-processed copy of the sources.
+ *
+ * &lt;p&gt;
+ *
+ * Errors are written by default to {@code ${project.build.directory}/docbkx/linktester.err}.
+ * The test does not fail on error.
+ */
+public class LinkTest {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public LinkTest(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Test links in pre-processed copy of the sources.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to complete link tests.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        Executor executor = new Executor();
+        executor.test();
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Enclose methods to run plugins.
+     */
+    class Executor extends MojoExecutor {
+
+        /**
+         * Run link tester.
+         *
+         * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to run link tester.
+         */
+        public void test() throws MojoExecutionException {
+
+            if (m.runLinkTester().equalsIgnoreCase(&quot;false&quot;)) {
+                return;
+            }
+
+            final String include =
+                    m.getDocbkxModifiableSourcesDirectory().getPath() + &quot;/**/&quot; + m.getDocumentSrcName();
+            final String log =
+                    m.getDocbkxOutputDirectory().getPath() + File.separator + &quot;linktester.err&quot;;
+            final String jiraUrlPattern =
+                    &quot;^https://bugster.forgerock.org/jira/browse/OPEN(AM|DJ|ICF|IDM|IG)-[0-9]{1,4}$&quot;;
+            final String rfcUrlPattern = &quot;^http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc[0-9]+$&quot;;
+
+            executeMojo(
+                    plugin(groupId(&quot;org.forgerock.maven.plugins&quot;),
+                            artifactId(&quot;linktester-maven-plugin&quot;),
+                            version(m.getLinkTesterVersion())),
+                    goal(&quot;check&quot;),
+                    configuration(
+                            element(name(&quot;includes&quot;),
+                                    element(name(&quot;include&quot;), include)),
+                            element(name(&quot;validating&quot;), &quot;true&quot;),
+                            element(name(&quot;skipUrls&quot;), m.skipLinkCheck()),
+                            element(name(&quot;xIncludeAware&quot;), &quot;true&quot;),
+                            element(name(&quot;failOnError&quot;), &quot;false&quot;),
+                            element(name(&quot;outputFile&quot;), log),
+                            element(name(&quot;skipUrlPatterns&quot;),
+                                    element(name(&quot;skipUrlPattern&quot;), jiraUrlPattern),
+                                    element(name(&quot;skipUrlPattern&quot;), rfcUrlPattern))),
+                    executionEnvironment(m.getProject(), m.getSession(), m.getPluginManager()));
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavensiteRedirectjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/site/Redirect.java (0 => 2242)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/site/Redirect.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/site/Redirect.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,63 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
+ *
+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:
+ *     Portions Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]
+ *
+ *     Copyright 2012-2014 ForgeRock AS
+ *
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.site;
+
+import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
+import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils;
+import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
+import org.forgerock.doc.maven.AbstractDocbkxMojo;
+
+import java.io.File;
+import java.io.IOException;
+
+/**
+ * Add file to redirect {@code /doc/index.html} to {@code /docs.html}.
+ */
+public class Redirect {
+
+    /**
+     * The Mojo that holds configuration and related methods.
+     */
+    private AbstractDocbkxMojo m;
+
+    /**
+     * Constructor setting the Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     *
+     * @param mojo The Mojo that holds the configuration.
+     */
+    public Redirect(final AbstractDocbkxMojo mojo) {
+        m = mojo;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Add file to redirect {@code /doc/index.html} to {@code /docs.html}.
+     *
+     * @throws MojoExecutionException Failed to write file.
+     */
+    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
+        try {
+            String s = File.separator;
+            File file = new File(m.getSiteDirectory().getPath() + s + &quot;doc&quot; + s + &quot;index.html&quot;);
+            if (!file.exists()) {
+                String redirect = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResourceAsStream(&quot;/index.html&quot;), &quot;UTF-8&quot;);
+                redirect = redirect.replaceAll(&quot;PROJECT&quot;, m.getProjectName())
+                        .replaceAll(&quot;LOWERCASE&quot;, m.getProjectName().toLowerCase());
+                FileUtils.write(file, redirect, &quot;UTF-8&quot;);
+            }
+        } catch (IOException e) {
+            throw new MojoExecutionException(&quot;Failed to copy redirect file: &quot; + e.getMessage(), e);
+        }
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockdocmavenplugintrunksrcmainjavaorgforgerockdocmavensitepackageinfojava"></a>

+++ forgerock-doc-maven-plugin/trunk/src/main/java/org/forgerock/doc/maven/site/package-info.java        2014-08-12 14:26:54 UTC (rev 2242)

+ * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
+ * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
+ * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

+ * If applicable, add the following below this MPL 2.0 HEADER, replacing
+ * the fields enclosed by brackets &quot;[]&quot; replaced with your own identifying
+ * information:

+/**
+ * Classes for preparing the project site.

+package org.forgerock.doc.maven.site;
